title: The Brixham 6-8 Person Electric Grill Table Set
body_html:
The Brixham Electric Grill Table Set, a garden table and bench set made entirely from 100% recycled plastic, featuring an electric grill and ice bucket for a unique outdoor dining experience. A dining table perfect for outdoor use in gardens, hotels & restaurants.

Make the most of your garden with environmentally conscious sustainable furniture, backed by a 25 Year Guarantee!

Design Insights

  • Featuring 13 Amp Vuestro Electric Grill
  • Manufactured from 100% Recycled Plastic
  • Flame, Smoke & Maintenance Free
  • Element guaranteed up to 10,000 hours
  • Rot, rust, water, splinter & frost proof
  • Weather & Vandal resistant
  • Easy to wipe clean or jet wash

What's Included

  • Table with built-in electric grill & ice bucket
  • 2 Benches with long cushions
  • 3 different grill options – full grill, flat plate and half & half grill
  • Table cover

Delivery

Enjoy Fast Delivery on this product, with orders processed and delivered within 4 Weeks!

Technical Info

Dimensions:

Length: 178 cm

Width: 117 cm

Height: 75 cm

Weight Including Benches: 358kg

Plant A Tree

For every item of furniture sold, DCW Polymers plant one tree in the local area. Better still, they don’t just pay a charity to plant the trees, their team go out for the day once a year to plant them by hand and physically make a difference to the local eco-system.

About DCW Polymers

Rediscover your love for the planet. Find 100% sustainable, recycled furniture like benches and tables at DCW Polymers. Made from eco-friendly materials, their furniture is built to outlast wooden alternatives, without requiring any maintenance.

Say goodbye to the constant battle of furniture wear and tear. Embrace recycled plastic furniture and reduce your carbon footprint today.

title: 6 x 4 Premium Pressure Treated Garden Bar With Shutters
body_html:
Turn Your Garden into the Ultimate Entertaining Space!

Enhance your garden with our practical and entertaining 6 x 4 Garden Bar and Shutter Pack. Suitable for even the smallest gardens, it's perfect for hosting gatherings and will quickly become the social focal point. Simply add stools, lights, and drinks to create the ultimate entertaining pub. 

The added shutter pack and side door offer a deeper bar for cocktail-making or additional guests, while also allowing for easy locking when finished. No need to bring everything back inside!

Crafted right here in the UK, this outdoor bar is built to last. We use pressure-treated 12mm tongue and groove boards paired with a sturdy 44mm x 44mm frame for a strong, durable, and long-lasting structure. The overlapping timber roof is designed with a sleek pent shape, allowing rainwater to effortlessly run off the back—keeping the inside dry and ensuring year-round enjoyment.

Upgrade your garden today and raise a glass to great times ahead! 

Design Insights

  •  15 Year Anti Rot Guarantee
  •  Pressure treated timber
  •  12mm Tongue and Groove Construction
  •  Strong build; 44mm framing for a robust durable structure
  •  Made from sustainably sourced timber
  •  Manufactured in the UK

Full Info

The Pressure Treated Garden Bar is expertly crafted in the UK using 12mm tongue and groove boards, reinforced with a sturdy 44mm x 44mm frame. This construction method not only ensures durability and strength, but also presents an appealing aesthetic. The roof is made from overlapping timber boards that are securely attached to an internal frame. The modern pent design allows rainwater to easily drain off the back of the bar, keeping the interior dry and preventing any water accumulation.

The pressure treatment process effectively safeguards the bar against insect damage and natural decay, while maintaining its appearance. Additionally, a 15-year anti-rot guarantee is included, although the bar must be built on a solid, flat base such as concrete or concrete slabs. (The use of waterproof treatment during initial construction and annually thereafter is recommended.)

Technical Info

Please Note: Sizes are approximate only. For specific details, please consult our sales team.

title: 7 x 5 Double Storey Snowdrop Wooden Playhouse with Loft
body_html:
Upgrade your outdoor play space with the Mercia 7 x 5 Double Storey Snowdrop Wooden Playhouse with Loft. The playhouse boasts a whimsical setting for children to enjoy a variety of imaginative games. With a two-story interior and traditional Georgian windows, the safety of your child is our top concern. The sash framing provides a secure fit for the styrene, while the charming flower boxes under each window add to the enchanting atmosphere.

Adorable flower boxes add a touch of charm and the premium Shiplap cladding ensures a durable, weatherproof panel with a beautiful finish. The solid sheet board roof and floor provide a sturdy surface for everyday use, while the high strength, shatterproof styrene windows guarantee a safe environment for your children.

Design Insights

  • Made in accordance with Toys (Safety) Regulation 2011 (EN71)
  • Suitable for Little Ones 3 Years and Older
  • Enjoy a 10 Year Anti Rot Guarantee
  • Planed & Rounded Edges for Safety
  • Safety First Shatterproof Windows
  • 12mm Interlocking Shiplap Tongue & Groove Cladding
  • Mineral Roofing Felt Supplied
  • Sustainable PEFC Timber
  • Handmade in the UK for Superior Quality
  • Opt for Professional Home Installation

Benefits of a Playhouse

A playhouse provides a space where children can let their imaginations run wild. They can invent stories, role-play different scenarios, and engage in imaginative play, all of which is crucial for cognitive development. Perhaps one day their playhouse will be a spaceship, the next day it’ll be a haven away from flowing lava. 

In addition to encouraging cognitive development, playing in a playhouse encourages physical activity and movement. Whether climbing, crawling, or running around, children develop their motor skills and coordination. We have designed our playhouses with this in mind, featuring a minimum 12mm finger gap around the door, planed and rounded timbers and ventilation holes and safety ladder treads, our playhouses are EN71 certified and UKCA Marked, so you can be sure your little one’s safety is our priority. 

Playhouses also encourage children out of the house. We live in a world where electronic tablets and on-demand television so easily become the forefront of a child’s free time, giving children space of their own, to virtually use as they please is a sure fire way to minimise the screen time and get them enjoying the great outdoors.

Technical Info

Please Note: Sizes are approximate only. For specific details, please consult our sales team.

Imperial Size (ft) 8 x 6
People Req'd To Build 2
Anti-Rot Guarantee 10 Years
Cladding Style Shiplap Tongue and Groove
Cladding Thickness 12mm
Roof Material 12mm Matchboard
Floor Material 12mm Matchboard
Roof Type Apex
Door Style Single Door
Building Type Playhouse
Treatment Type Dip Treated
Metric Size (Meters) 2.3 x 1.8
Under 2.5m Tall Yes
Material Wood


Imperial Metric
Width 91.7 in 2.33 m
Depth 72.8 in 1.85 m
Eaves Height 61.4 in 1.56 m
Ridge Height 80.3 in 2.04 m
Door Width 24.4 in 0.62 m
Internal Width 80.3 in 2.04 m
Internal Depth 55.9 in 1.42 m


Full Info

Home Installation Available

So you can sit back and let us do all the hard work, why not opt for a Home Installation Service? Your new playhouse will be installed by an expert team for an additional cost. They will arrive ready to put up your new playhouse to our exacting standards, which means your kids won’t be pestering you to find out when it’s going to be ready! The team will tidy up after themselves, so the only thing you have to do is remind the kids to come inside when dinner is ready.

Prior to booking the date of your home installation, you will need to have a firm and level base ready for construction.

Fixtures and Fittings

Robust roofing felt, fixtures and fittings are all supplied as standard, alongside our detailed instructions and our manufacturer’s recommendations, to ensure a simple and stress free assembly process.

Anti-Rot Guarantee 

Our playhouses come with a 10 year anti-rot guarantee as standard, meaning you can relax knowing your playhouse is covered while ever your children are young and having fun in the garden. In order to ensure the validity of the guarantee, you will need to treat your new shed every year with wood treatment to prevent fungal attacks and promote its long life.

Sustainable Timber

All of our playhouses are made using only ethically sourced and certified timber and are all made here in the UK by our highly skilled team. We know how important looking after the planet is for our future generations, that’s why we work alongside PEFC to ensure our timber is only sourced from managed, sustainable forests.

Treatment Requirements

This playhouse is supplied un-treated and will require a coat of high quality timber treatment once installed.

title: Poppy Tower Wooden Playhouse with Slide
body_html:
Transform your children into rulers of their imaginary kingdom with our Poppy Tower Wooden Playhouse with Slide. Elevated on its own lookout, this playhouse serves as a perfect source of inspiration for imaginative childhood games such as sailing on a pirate ship or spotting dinosaurs from the Jurassic era. In addition to the playhouse, the Slide offers hours of additional fun. Kids love to woosh up and down the slide all day long.

Made from high-quality Shiplap cladding with interlocking tongue and groove boards, the playhouse offers both durability and an attractive appearance. Both the roof and floor are constructed from sturdy solid sheet board, providing a sturdy surface for everyday play. Our playhouses also feature high-strength, unbreakable styrene windows, giving you peace of mind that your little ones are safe from any glass-related injuries.

title: 5 x 10 Snug Tower Wooden Playhouse with Slide
body_html:
Discover infinite opportunities for outdoor fun in your backyard with the Snug Tower Wooden Playhouse with Slide. Let your creativity run wild as you transform this wendy house into a princess palace, fairy sanctuary, or castle lookout. Boasting a raised platform, a ladder, and a slide, this kids' playhouse offers endless adventures for curious little ones.

Constructed with durable shiplap tongue & groove boards and a sturdy solid sheet board roof and floor, this playhouse provides a secure and durable play space for everyday use.

All of Mercia's playhouses are designed with safety as the top priority featuring the following safety components: EN71 certification and UKCA marking, a 12mm safety gap to prevent finger trapping, styrene windows (a safer alternative to glass), rounded timbers to prevent splinters, and ladder treads to prevent slipping. Additionally, the playhouse also includes ventilation holes (intended for domestic use only). Suitable for children 36 months and older.

Benefits of a Playhouse

A playhouse offers children a creative outlet to explore their imagination. With the freedom to invent stories and act out various scenarios, children can engage in imaginative play, which is essential for cognitive growth. Whether they transform the playhouse into a spaceship or a safe haven from molten lava, children will have endless hours of fun and learning. 

The playhouse not only promotes cognitive development, but also encourages physical activity and movement. Children improve their motor skills and coordination while climbing, crawling, or running around. We have taken this into consideration when designing our playhouses, ensuring a minimum 12mm finger gap around the door, planed and rounded timbers, and ventilation holes. Our playhouses are EN71 certified and UKCA Marked, prioritizing your child's safety.

In today's society, electronic devices and television tend to dominate a child's free time. To reduce screen time and encourage outdoor activities, providing a dedicated space for children to enjoy is essential. Playhouses offer the perfect solution for children to have their own area to explore and play.

Full Details

Apex Roof

This shed boasts a spacious interior with a high apex roof, perfect for accommodating large bicycles and accompanying gear.

All Fixtures and Fittings

Supplied with high-quality roofing felt to protect from the elements and ensure long-lasting durability. Includes standard fixtures and fittings, along with comprehensive installation instructions from Mercia to make setting up your new shed a quick and easy process.

Security

All Mercia overlap sheds come equipped with Z-braced doors and a hasp and staple lock for added security and affordability, giving you peace of mind and confidence in their reliable design.

Home Installation Available

Mercia offers a Home Installation Service with experienced installers for your convenience. For an extra cost, they will carefully assemble your new garden building to meet Mercia's high standards. Afterwards, they will clean up, leaving you free to relax and plan your new log cabin decor.

Ensure that a sturdy and even foundation is prepared prior to scheduling a date for home installation.

Anti-Rot Guarantee 

Ensure the 10 year anti-rot guarantee by treating your log cabin annually with wood treatment to protect against fungal attacks and prolong its lifespan.

Shiplap vs. Overlap

Overlap and Shiplap are two distinct cladding options for sheds. Cladding serves as the exterior covering of the building. The overlapping boards of overlap cladding provide a traditional and rustic appearance. This design allows for proper drainage and prevents rainwater from reaching your stored items, keeping them dry. While this design offers protection against the rain, it may not be completely airtight, leaving room for potential draughts and moisture.

Shiplap cladding features multiple timber boards that form a flush panel. The recess at the top of each board aids in water run-off, providing protection against harsh elements. It is not only watertight like overlap cladding, but also airtight, making it ideal for storing items at risk of draughts and dampness. Additionally, its smooth exterior and interior panels create a sleek and sophisticated finish, elevating the look of your garden.

body_html:
The 3m x 3m Wren Pent Log Cabin - 28mm boasts a contemporary and sleek appearance, thanks to its pent roof design. Its slanted roof allows it to seamlessly blend into any garden, while also creating a cozy and inviting interior atmosphere.

Equipped with three large windows and fully glazed double doors, the Wren offers an ideal spot to unwind and observe the world outside. The modern yet classic ironmongery adds a touch of elegance to both the inside and outside of your new garden retreat.

Design Insights

  • 10-year anti-rot guarantee
  • Contemporary and modern pent design
  • Full length windows for a bright and airy space
  • Locking double doors for peace of mind
  • Superior three point locking system for added security
  • Handmade in the UK for superior quality
  • Opt for professional home installation
  • Available in a range of log thicknesses to suit all budgets
  • 16mm interlocking tongue and groove roof and floor
  • All fixtures and fittings included
  • Weatherproof mineral roofing felt include
  • Easy assembly with clear instructions
  • Air vent for increased air flow, minimising damp
  • Sustainably sourced PEFC certified timber
  • Double glazed windows promoting heat retention and minimising noise pollution

Full Details

Different log thicknesses available

Expand your options with the Wren log cabin, offering log thickness choices of 28mm, 34mm, or 44mm interlocking boards to suit your specific needs. Each thickness option brings its own unique benefits. With thicker log boards, you'll enjoy improved insulation, making your cabin more versatile and comfortable in all seasons. Enjoy better protection from the summer heat and winter cold, along with reduced noise levels for a tranquil environment perfect for both work and relaxation.

Features

Constructed with durable 16mm tongue and groove boards, the roof and floor fit together securely to form strong panels, perfect for all of your furniture needs. Included premium roofing felt offers protection against harsh British weather to ensure long-lasting durability. An extra vent encourages air circulation inside the cabin, reducing the chance of moisture and improving overall ventilation. Lastly, modern and timeless ironmongery adds a stylish finishing touch to the interior and exterior of your new garden retreat.

UPVC doors and windows available

For a remarkable upgrade, consider the 3m x 3m Wren log cabin with UPVC doors and windows. Options include anthracite, oak, and white finishes.

Anti-Rot Guarantee 

Ensure the 10 year anti-rot guarantee by treating your log cabin annually with wood treatment to protect against fungal attacks and prolong its lifespan.

Home Installation Available

Mercia offers a Home Installation Service with experienced installers for your convenience. For an extra cost, they will carefully assemble your new garden building to meet Mercia's high standards. Afterwards, they will clean up, leaving you free to relax and plan your new log cabin decor.

Ensure that a sturdy and even foundation is prepared prior to scheduling a date for home installation.

Sustainable Timber

All of Mercia's wooden garden buildings are made using only ethically sourced and certified timber and are all made here in the UK by their highly skilled team.

Technical Info

Imperial Size (ft) 10 x 11
People Req'd To Build 2
Anti-Rot Guarantee 10 Years
Cladding Style Traditional Interlocking Boards
Roof Type Pent
Door Style Double Door
Building Type Contemporary Log Cabin
Treatment Type Untreated
Metric Size (Meters) 3.0 x 3.3
Log Thickness 28mm, 34mm or 44mm
Under 2.5m Tall Yes
Material Wood


Imperial Metric

title: Alfresco Chef Kamado Lite Wood Fired Outdoor Oven
body_html:
Meet the Alfresco Kamado Lite - the latest member of the Alfresco Chef family, made to enhance your outdoor cooking. Meticulously crafted and sure to impress, the compact, black, table-top Kamado oven combines the rich tastes of wood-fired cooking with contemporary ease and flair.

Features:

The Alfresco Kamado Lite is a versatile companion that brings authentic wood-fired flavors to your home, perfect for both experienced grill masters and beginners alike. Enjoy style, functionality, and performance in one.

‌Perfect for Any Outdoor Occasion

Enhance any gathering with the sleek, compact Alfresco Kamado Lite - perfect for all your outdoor cooking needs!

‌Elevate Your Outdoor Cooking Game Today

Experience wood-fired cooking with the Alfresco Kamado Lite! Order now for a versatile, durable, and stylish Kamado oven. Every meal is an adventure!

Design Insights

Compact Design: Perfectly sized for table-top use, the Alfresco Kamado Lite is ideal for small patios, balconies, and outdoor kitchens. Its compact footprint means it fits seamlessly into any outdoor space without sacrificing performance.

Premium Build Quality: Constructed from high-quality ceramic, the Alfresco Kamado Lite offers superior heat retention, ensuring consistent cooking temperatures and exceptional flavor with every use. The sleek black finish adds a touch of elegance and sophistication to your outdoor setup.

Versatile Cooking Capabilities: Grill, smoke, roast, or bake – the Alfresco Kamado Lite does it all. Its versatile design allows you to cook a variety of dishes, from perfectly seared steaks to slow-cooked ribs, crispy pizzas, and even freshly baked bread. The possibilities are endless!

Efficient Heat Control: The Kamado Lite features a precision air vent system that allows you to control the temperature with ease. Whether you need a low, slow cook for tender meats or high heat for a quick sear, the Alfresco Kamado Lite delivers with accuracy.

Durable and Weather-Resistant: Built to withstand the elements, the Alfresco Kamado Lite is weather-resistant and durable, ensuring long-lasting performance year-round. Its sturdy construction and quality materials mean you can enjoy delicious, wood-fired meals for years to come.

Easy to Use and Maintain: With a user-friendly design, the Alfresco Kamado Lite makes outdoor cooking simple and enjoyable. Its easy-to-clean surfaces and efficient ash management system mean less time on maintenance and more time savoring your culinary creations.

FREE GIFT

A little thank you from us - Enhance your pizza slicing experience with a free* Alfresco Chef's Stainless Steel Pizza Cutter Wheel. Designed for effortless and precise slicing, this durable tool features a curved handle for easy grip and is ideal for both home cooks and professional chefs.

As well as a free included Pizza Peel from Alfresco Chef, this Pizza Wheel, usually £7.95, comes free* with every purchase of a Pizza Oven. Enjoy perfectly divided pizza slices in an instant with this user-friendly and high-quality cutting wheel. The perfect combo to start your Pizza Oven Passion!

*One per order. Automatically added to your order

Care & Maintenance

To become the household expert in wood-fired ovens, it is important to routinely remove ash and debris after each use to maintain proper airflow and efficient heating. A soft brush or scraper can effectively remove soot and food residue from the interior. Prevent cracks by slowly heating the oven with small fires, particularly after extended periods of inactivity. Safeguard the oven from moisture by covering it when not in use and avoiding exposure to rain. Regular inspections for damage or cracks are recommended, and any issues can be addressed with proper refractory materials to extend the oven's lifespan. Replacement parts are also available upon request.

3 Year Warranty

Alfresco Chef guarantee the wood fired oven and its components to be free from defects in materials and workmanship for up to 3 years.

Please retain your receipt, invoice or any other proof of purchase for the duration of your ownership and register your oven online here

In the unlikely event that something does go wrong, we will endeavour to

  • Repair or replace faulty component parts.
  • If the fault cannot be repaired, we will replace the whole oven.
  • In the event the oven is replaced, we require the existing oven to be returned.

To make a warranty claim, please contact their customer support team by email info@thealfrescochef.co.uk. Please note, proof of purchase will be required at the time of contact.

Exclusions

These exclusions apply to the warranty:

  • The oven has not been used in accordance with the manual
  • Use of anything other than untreated hardwood for fuel and burning the oven at excessive temperatures over 450°C
  • Normal wear and tear (e.g. oven tiles and thermometer)
  • Discolouration or heat tarnishing.
  • Water damage
  • Surface rust
  • Minor distortion or warping caused by prolonged exposure to heat, where warping does not prevent use of the oven
  • Alterations and modifications to the oven change the condition detected at delivery of the product
  • If the damage is the result of the use of chemicals inside or outside the oven
  • Damage to parts not functional and decorative that do not affect the normal use of the oven, including scratches and colours differences
  • The warranty does not cover the stone tiles for general wear and tear or breakages in use

• Ready when you are: Fires up quick, so you're not left twiddling your thumbs when hunger strikes. It will reach 500 degrees celsius in 10-15mins.

• User-friendly: Don't worry if you're not a pro chef. This oven's designed to make you look good, even if it's your first rodeo.

This oven boasts a 8cm ceramic fibre installation and 3cm thick fire brick floor tiles, allowing it to quickly reach and maintain a temperature of 400°C within just 20 minutes, ensuring consistent cooking results every time.

More than a pizza oven Live fire cooking at its best.
Utilize the wood placement and provided oven door and accessories to execute various cooking techniques including BBQ, baking, and roasting. This method will infuse your food with delectable wood-fired taste.

The oven is super easy to light. The user guide shows you how to get your oven safely and efficiently lit. It’s also really easy to manage and use with an Alfresco Chef pizza peel set.

Maintenance is really simple too. You can quickly clean your oven by brushing the fire brick tiles down with a stainless steel brush and wiping down the exterior with oven cleaner.

The oven also comes with a base shelf for wood storage, so you can keep your wood close at hand when using it.

A little thank you from us - Enhance your pizza slicing experience with a free* Alfresco Chef's Stainless Steel Pizza Cutter Wheel. Designed for effortless and precise slicing, this durable tool features a curved handle for easy grip and is ideal for both home cooks and professional chefs.

As well as a free included Pizza Peel from Alfresco Chef, this Pizza Wheel, usually £7.95, comes free* with every purchase of a Pizza Oven. Enjoy perfectly divided pizza slices in an instant with this user-friendly and high-quality cutting wheel. The perfect combo to start your Pizza Oven Passion!

*One per order. Automatically added to your order

Care & Maintenance

To become the household expert in wood-fired ovens, it is important to routinely remove ash and debris after each use to maintain proper airflow and efficient heating. A soft brush or scraper can effectively remove soot and food residue from the interior. Prevent cracks by slowly heating the oven with small fires, particularly after extended periods of inactivity. Safeguard the oven from moisture by covering it when not in use and avoiding exposure to rain. Regular inspections for damage or cracks are recommended, and any issues can be addressed with proper refractory materials to extend the oven's lifespan. Replacement parts are also available upon request.

3 Year Warranty

Alfresco Chef guarantee the wood fired oven and its components to be free from defects in materials and workmanship for up to 3 years.

Please retain your receipt, invoice or any other proof of purchase for the duration of your ownership and register your oven online here

In the unlikely event that something does go wrong, we will endeavour to

  • Repair or replace faulty component parts.
  • If the fault cannot be repaired, we will replace the whole oven.
  • In the event the oven is replaced, we require the existing oven to be returned.

To make a warranty claim, please contact their customer support team by email info@thealfrescochef.co.uk. Please note, proof of purchase will be required at the time of contact.

Exclusions

These exclusions apply to the warranty:

  • The oven has not been used in accordance with the manual
  • Use of anything other than untreated hardwood for fuel and burning the oven at excessive temperatures over 450°C
  • Normal wear and tear (e.g. oven tiles and thermometer)
  • Discolouration or heat tarnishing.
  • Water damage
  • Surface rust
  • Minor distortion or warping caused by prolonged exposure to heat, where warping does not prevent use of the oven
  • Alterations and modifications to the oven change the condition detected at delivery of the product
  • If the damage is the result of the use of chemicals inside or outside the oven
  • Damage to parts not functional and decorative that do not affect the normal use of the oven, including scratches and colours differences
  • The warranty does not cover the stone tiles for general wear and tear or breakages in use

title: Alfresco Chef Naples Wood Fired Outdoor Pizza Oven
body_html:
The Alfresco Chef Naples Wood Fired Outdoor Pizza Oven offers more than just cooking capabilities - it creates a warm and inviting atmosphere for good times with friends and family. Imagine the enticing scent of wood smoke in the air, the sound of food sizzling in the oven, and the joyful laughter of loved ones. This oven isn't simply for meals, it's an experience. If this sounds like your ideal evening, then you may have discovered your new go-to accessory.

Features:

  • Mobile stand for greater stability and easy storage
  • Flat base for safe, easy mounting on heat-proof outdoor kitchen surfaces
  • Spacious 60cm x 55cm cooking floor size
  • Assemble manual and user guide.

Design Insights

• Double the fun: This beast can handle 2 pizzas at once. Perfect for when you've got a hungry crowd or just can't decide on toppings.

• Built like a tank: We're talking seriously robust construction. This oven's not messing around - it's ready for years of delicious adventures.

• Portable party machine: It comes with its own stand, so you can wheel this bad boy wherever the action is.

• Flavour central: Wood-fired cooking isn't just about pizza (though, let's be honest, wood-fired pizza is amazing). Think succulent roasts, smokey veggies, even crusty bread. Your taste buds are in for a treat.

• Ready when you are: Fires up quick, so you're not left twiddling your thumbs when hunger strikes. It will reach 500 degrees celsius in 10-15mins.

• User-friendly: Don't worry if you're not a pro chef. This oven's designed to make you look good, even if it's your first rodeo.

• Low-maintenance heat: Uses kindling and logs, so keeping the fire going is a breeze. More time for you to kick back with your guests.

• Got your back: Comes with a solid warranty. Because peace of mind tastes pretty good too.

Full Info

This oven offers the perfect introduction to authentic wood fired cooking. It gives would-be chefs, party hosts and their guests the unique experience and flavours of wood fired food.

The Naples oven is fun, easy to use and highly versatile: it’s great for the pizza enthusiast who wants a fuller flavour, but can also be used to barbecue, bake or roast your specially prepared dishes. With a Naples oven, your food will be packed with delicious wood-fired flavour.

The Naples oven has been designed to be compact and make best use of space. With a generous footprint, it’s the ideal outdoor oven for households with a garden, but not an abundance of space.

This multi-purpose oven is built with 5cm ceramic fibre insulation and 3cm thick fire brick floor tiles. That means it can quickly reach a temperature of 400°C within 15 minutes, maintaining its heat consistently so you get great results from your wood fired cooking.

With clever positioning of the oven door and your kiln dried hardwood fuel, you can use the oven to perform a variety of different cooking methods.

The oven is super easy to light. The user guide shows you how to get your oven safely and efficiently lit. It’s also really easy to manage and use with an Alfresco Chef pizza peel set.

Maintenance is really simple too. You can quickly clean your oven by brushing the fire brick tiles down with a stainless steel brush and wiping down the exterior with oven cleaner.

The oven also comes with a base shelf for wood storage, so you can keep your wood close at hand when using it.

Your oven comes with a step by step assembly guide, user manual and of course the peace of mind of a three year warranty.

FREE GIFT

A little thank you from us - Enhance your pizza slicing experience with a free* Alfresco Chef's Stainless Steel Pizza Cutter Wheel. Designed for effortless and precise slicing, this durable tool features a curved handle for easy grip and is ideal for both home cooks and professional chefs.

As well as a free included Pizza Peel from Alfresco Chef, this Pizza Wheel, usually £7.95, comes free* with every purchase of a Pizza Oven. Enjoy perfectly divided pizza slices in an instant with this user-friendly and high-quality cutting wheel. The perfect combo to start your Pizza Oven Passion!

*One per order. Automatically added to your order

Care & Maintenance

To become the household expert in wood-fired ovens, it is important to routinely remove ash and debris after each use to maintain proper airflow and efficient heating. A soft brush or scraper can effectively remove soot and food residue from the interior. Prevent cracks by slowly heating the oven with small fires, particularly after extended periods of inactivity. Safeguard the oven from moisture by covering it when not in use and avoiding exposure to rain. Regular inspections for damage or cracks are recommended, and any issues can be addressed with proper refractory materials to extend the oven's lifespan. Replacement parts are also available upon request.

In the unlikely event that something does go wrong, we will endeavour to

  • Repair or replace faulty component parts.
  • If the fault cannot be repaired, we will replace the whole oven.
  • In the event the oven is replaced, we require the existing oven to be returned.

title: 3m x 2m Insulated Garden Room
body_html:
This 3m x 2m Insulated Garden Room by Mercia is the ideal garden hideaway for those seeking some alone time with a book or a home office separate from the main house. Its compact size and modern design, featuring full length windows and a contemporary overhang, make it a perfect fit for any outdoor space.

Design Insights

  •  Professional Home Installation Available
  •  10 Year Anti Rot Guarantee
  •  Sturdy 72mm Thick Double Skinned Walls
  •  EcoQuilt Insulation Walls & Roof Keeping it Cosy
  •  Featuring Air Tec Insulation in the floor
  •  Double Glazed Windows for Warmth, Security & Noise Reduction
  •  High-Calibre Tongue & Groove Roof and Floor
  •  Made from Sustainably Sourced Timber
  •  Handmade in the UK for Superior Quality

Benefits of an Insulated Garden Room

Maximize your living space with a budget-friendly solution - insulated garden rooms. Ideal for various purposes, such as a home office, exercise space, art studio, or serene retreat, these rooms offer tranquility and seclusion from your main residence. 

With insulation in the roof and floor, as well as double-glazed windows, you can enjoy year-round use and protection from the elements. Plus, adding a garden room can increase your property value by up to 1.5 times the cost, making it a smart investment for the future.

Full Details

Fully Insulated Structure

Mercia's Garden Rooms are fully insulated with 72mm thick walls and EcoQuilt insulation in between each timber cladding. The roof is also equipped with EcoQuilt, a UK-manufactured multi-foil insulation with a high-performance vapour control layer to prevent damp and moisture.

The AirTec insulated floor further reduces heat loss by trapping air in its bubble structure. Enjoy year-round comfort in your new space, with cool summers and warm winters.

If you're looking for something with even more warmth, why not take a look at our Sherwood range of premium Insulated Garden Rooms?

Mineral Felt Roof Covering

High quality roofing felt is supplied to protect your insulated garden room from the elements and provide longevity.

Double Glazed Windows as Standard

Designed as standard to feature double glazed, opening windows, this 3m x 2m Insulated Garden Room provides multiple benefits. Enjoy a refreshing summer breeze while maintaining proper ventilation, promoting the longevity of your building. Furthermore, the double glazing technology ensures superior heat retention during colder months and keeps the heat out in warmer seasons. Additionally, it helps reduce noise pollution, creating a peaceful and secluded sanctuary.

Anti-Rot Guarantee

Enjoy peace of mind with their Insulated Garden Rooms, backed by a 10-year anti-rot guarantee at no extra cost. You can relax in your new outdoor space knowing your building is protected. To uphold the validity of this guarantee, it's essential to annually treat your new garden room with wood treatment. This simple step helps prevent fungal attacks, ensuring the longevity of your new serene retreat.

Home Installation Included

So you can sit back and relax, Home Installation Service by Mercias expert installers is included with the price of this building as standard. They will arrive ready to put up your new retreat to our exacting standards. They’ll tidy up after themselves, so the only thing you have to do is step in and enjoy your new space.

Prior to booking the date of your home installation, you will need to have a firm and level base ready for construction, or have selected the Elite Timber Base option from our upgrades list.

Sustainable Timber

Each insulated garden room in our selection is exclusively crafted from ethically sourced and certified timber, meticulously manufactured right here in the UK by an experienced team.

title: 10 x 8 Woodsman Shiplap Apex Wooden Shed
body_html:
The 10 x 8 Woodsman Shiplap Apex Wooden Shed, part of the premium 'Woodsman' range from Mercia, boasts the largest size available. It's perfect for storing larger, bulkier items with ease, thanks to its heavy-duty frame. This shed is a long-lasting investment that embodies the importance of avoiding cheap purchases.

The Woodsman range provides the option of a premium shed, manufactured to last and designed to withstand all of life's demands. If you're looking for the best shed manufactured by the UK's oldest shed manufacturer, look no further than the Woodsman range by Mercia.

Design Insights

  • Mercia’s flagship shed range
  • Superfast 2-3 day delivery
  • Robust 2" x 1" framing
  • Strong 12mm shiplap cladding
  • Customise your space with modular design
  • Move the doors and windows to your needs
  • Easy assembly with clear instructions
  • 10-year anti-rot guarantee
  • Durable tongue and groove roof and floor
  • Top quality ironmongery included
  • All fixtures and fittings included
  • Weatherproof mineral roofing felt included
  • Shatterproof styrene windows for safety
  • Made from sustainably sourced timber
  • Handmade in the UK for superior quality

Full Details

Shiplap sheds are created by cladding which comprises of several timber boards stacked on top of one another to form a seamless panel. With a groove at the top of each board, this encourages water run off and ensuring the interior remains dry as well as air tight.

Our shiplap sheds come with a tongue and groove roof and floor. Hard-wearing and robust, this flooring will easily withstand daily use, such as being utilised as a workshop, and is the ideal option for storing heavier items. 

Woodsman sheds from Waltons are manufactured from thick 2" x 1" internal framing, meaning your shed will stand sturdy, tall and proud for many years to come. In addition, another added benefit of the Woodsman range is that you're able to upgrade to additional internal frame supports for further strength and longevity. 

Customisable, Modular Design

Available in multiple sizes, our Woodsman sheds are versatile and customisable. They feature a modular design, allowing you to customise the placement of doors and windows to your liking and garden layout. Whether you prefer the door positioned at the end of the shed or windows lining a single side, anything is possible with a Woodsman from Waltons.

Apex Roof

Featuring a high apex roof-line, you’ll find there is plenty of headroom inside, ideal for storing taller items or utilising your shed as a workshop with plenty of space for spending hours tinkering away.

All Fixtures and Fittings

High quality roofing felt is supplied to protect your garden shed from the elements and provide longevity. In addition to this, all fixtures and fittings are supplied as standard and it also includes our comprehensive product instructions helping you install your new shed as quickly and easily as possible.

Security

This garden building comes complete with Z-braced doors and upgraded pad bolt giving you peace of mind and protection.

Technical Info

Extra Strength Floor Support Pack

The perfect solution if you are planning to use your garden shed as storage for heavy garden equipment such as lawn mowers or machinery. This floor bearer pack adds extra support to the floor of any garden shed, making this a cost-effective way to strengthen the floor. 

Please Note: You may need to trim the length to fit.

Guarantee

Treatment Requirements

This shed is supplied untreated and will require a coat of high quality timber treatment once installed. 

Anti-Rot Guarantee 

Mercia garden sheds come with a 10 year anti-rot guarantee as standard, meaning you can relax knowing your building is covered. In order to ensure the validity of the guarantee, you will need to treat your new shed every year with wood treatment to prevent fungal attacks and promote its long life.

body_html:
This 8 x 4 Woodsman Shiplap Apex Wooden Shed from Mercia's Premium 'Woodsman' shed range is an ideal option for smaller gardens or those needing minimal storage space. Its thicker framing sets it apart from other Shiplap sheds on the market, ensuring its durability and long-lasting quality. The right choice when choosing an investment in quality over price.

The Woodsman range provides the option to own a premium shed, manufactured to last and designed to withstand all of life's demands. If you're looking for the best shed manufactured by the UK's oldest shed manufacturer, look no further than the Woodsman range by Mercia.

Design Insights

  •  Mercia flagship shed range. Unbeatable quality.

  •  Customise your space with modular design

  •  Made from sustainably sourced timber
  •  Handmade in the UK for superior quality

Full Details

Woodsman Shiplap Sheds

Shiplap sheds are created by cladding which comprises of several timber boards stacked on top of one another to form a seamless panel. With a groove at the top of each board, this encourages water run off and ensuring the interior remains dry as well as air tight.

Our shiplap sheds come with a tongue and groove roof and floor. Hard-wearing and robust, this flooring will easily withstand daily use, such as being utilised as a workshop, and is the ideal option for storing heavier items. 

Woodsman sheds from Waltons are manufactured from thick 2" x 1" internal framing, meaning your shed will stand sturdy, tall and proud for many years to come. In addition, another added benefit of the Woodsman range is that you're able to upgrade to additional internal frame supports for further strength and longevity. 

Customisable, Modular Design

Available in multiple sizes, our Woodsman sheds are versatile and customisable. They feature a modular design, allowing you to customise the placement of doors and windows to your liking and garden layout. Whether you prefer the door positioned at the end of the shed or windows lining a single side, anything is possible with a Woodsman from Waltons.

Ready Painted

Choosing a pre-painted Woodsman shed saves you hours of time and effort. We use premium, fully opaque paint to ensure a durable, low-maintenance finish that protects the building from weather, UV exposure, mold, and fungal growth. To keep it looking its best, we include a 1L tin of paint for any future touch-ups. Simply choose the colour that bests suits your style.

Apex Roof

Featuring a high apex roof-line, you’ll find there is plenty of headroom inside, ideal for storing taller items or utilising your shed as a workshop with plenty of space for spending hours tinkering away.

All Fixtures and Fittings

High quality roofing felt is supplied to protect your garden shed from the elements and provide longevity. In addition to this, all fixtures and fittings are supplied as standard and it also includes our comprehensive product instructions helping you install your new shed as quickly and easily as possible.

Security

This garden building comes complete with Z-braced doors and upgraded pad bolt giving you peace of mind and protection.

Our shiplap sheds come with a tongue and groove roof and floor. Hard-wearing and robust, this flooring will easily withstand daily use, such as being utilised as a workshop, and is the ideal option for storing heavier items. 

Woodsman sheds from Waltons are manufactured from thick 2" x 1" internal framing, meaning your shed will stand sturdy, tall and proud for many years to come. In addition, another added benefit of the Woodsman range is that you're able to upgrade to additional internal frame supports for further strength and longevity. 

Customisable, Modular Design

Available in multiple sizes, our Woodsman sheds are versatile and customisable. They feature a modular design, allowing you to customise the placement of doors and windows to your liking and garden layout. Whether you prefer the door positioned at the end of the shed or windows lining a single side, anything is possible with a Woodsman from Waltons.

Ready Painted

Choosing a pre-painted Woodsman shed saves you hours of time and effort. We use premium, fully opaque paint to ensure a durable, low-maintenance finish that protects the building from weather, UV exposure, mold, and fungal growth. To keep it looking its best, we include a 1L tin of paint for any future touch-ups. Simply choose the colour that bests suits your style.

Pent Roof

Featuring a contemporary pent roof-line, you can rest knowing the shed's naturally sloped silhouette allows for superior rainwater runoff, ensuring the shed remains dry throughout the British seasons. 

All Fixtures and Fittings

High quality roofing felt is supplied to protect your garden shed from the elements and provide longevity. In addition to this, all fixtures and fittings are supplied as standard and it also includes our comprehensive product instructions helping you install your new shed as quickly and easily as possible.

Security

This garden building comes complete with Z-braced doors and upgraded pad bolt giving you peace of mind and protection.

title: Lightpro 60W Transformer Timer & Light Sensor
body_html:
This plug-in transformer is used to connect and power your Lightpro system directly, without the use of a main cable.

The 12V - 24W transformer is splash-proof and suitable for outdoor use. This transformer is suitable for 12V light fixtures with a power consumption of up to 24W. The 60W Lightpro transformer includes a timer and daylight sensor for the ultimate control of your lighting system.

 Are you looking to buy a transformer? If so, first determine how many light fixtures you want to install in your garden.

Lightpro 60W Transformer

  • The total wattage for the connected products must not exceed the capacity of the transformer, or else the transformer may be damaged beyond repair.
  • The transformer must not be opened.
  • The transformer must be connected to the mains (230Volt 50 Hz) and is suitable for outdoor and indoor use (IP44, splash-water-proof) when installed at least half a meter above the ground with the cables coming from the bottom.
  • The plug of the transformer must not be plugged into the wall socket until the complete set
    has been installed.
  • The transformer has an automatic circuit breaker.
  • Protection class II: this product is double-insulated and need not be connected to an earth wire.


Connecting The Low Voltage Main Cable

Strip 1cm of insulation off the ends of the low voltage cable. Insert stripped ends under pressure plates (cable shoes supplied).

Alternatively use a 143A transformer connector.

Tighten pressure plates securely onto the bare wire. Make sure insulation clears pressure plates.

• Converts 230 volts to 12 volts
• Note: M-connector (138A) is required

body_html:
The Xible is a versatile spotlight, measuring 70 cm high, that can be easily secured in the ground with the included spike. Its flexible design allows you to angle the light to best illuminate plants from below or above, making it a functional and beautiful addition to any border.

• Perfect spotlight for illuminating shrubs or plants
• Adjustable (flexible fixture)
• Illuminates up to 2 metres

Ready to get started? Here's your Lightpro Brochure - Follow pages 7 & 8 for your set up guide

12v low voltage lighting means that it's safe for animals & people, and easy to install without the need for an electrician. 

All Lightpro fittings come with a female connector and a 6 year warranty when used within a complete Lightpro system.

Technical Info

Product Features

Colour Black

Cable 1 metre

Lumen / Colour 160 / 2700K Warm White

System LightPro
Projected Lamp Lifetime 25,000 hours
Warranty 6 Years

LightPro Connection System

The Lightpro 12V outdoor lighting system is easily installed by anyone. Simply run Lightpro main cabling around your garden. Connect the award winning Lightpro connectors to the main cable and plug in your lights. It's then simply a case of connecting your main cable to the transformer and plugging the transformer into a standard outdoor plug socket.

Fast, Simple & Safe

Warranty

From 1st April 2023 all complete Lightpro systems purchased come with a 6 year warranty.

Prior to this date, complete systems had a 5 year warranty. 

All Non Lightpro items come with a 12 months warranty.

Warranty provision

1. General

These guarantee provisions are to be read in conjunction with the prevailing General Terms and Conditions for the sale of Techmar lighting products or with any other terms and conditions agreed between Techmar and the buyer.

In addition to these guarantee provisions, the (General) Terms and Conditions of Techmar remain effective and legally valid. In the event of any discrepancies between these guarantee provisions and the (General) terms and conditions relating to the products, the guarantee provisions will prevail.

According to the conditions and provisos of the guarantee as specified below, Techmar guarantees that the products will be free of defects.

Under the terms of these guarantee provisions, a defect (or defective product) means that a product has a material or construction fault that makes it largely impossible for the product to perform in accordance with the agreed specifications. The buyer has a guarantee to the product during the guarantee period subject to the provisions below.

The guarantee applies to the LightPro outdoor lighting fixtures with accessories. The included light sources are hereby excluded.

The guarantee period for LightPro outdoor lighting fixtures with accessories comprises 6 years.

The guarantee only applies to products working in an ambient temperature of a minimum of -20 C and a maximum of + 50 C.

For end users/consumers, the guarantee period starts on the purchase date, for resale organisations, distributors or dealers, it starts on the delivery date.

The guarantee period no longer applies if/in case the specific product properties have been changed by others than those authorised by Techmar, or in case Techmar products are joined or connected to products other than Techmar products.

Dimming and the application of network-control systems affect the guarantee.

The guarantee only applies if the product is used, installed and maintained properly in accordance with our instructions in the product manual, where necessary allowing for the specific tolerances on luminous flux and system power as stated in the accompanying product documentation/manual.

The buyer cannot rely on any other information or documentation.

The products must have been purchased directly from Techmar or from a resale organisation, distributor or dealer of Techmar.

The proof of purchase of the products must be present and available to Techmar. The warranty only applies when a complete Lightpro system is installed.

2. Terms and conditions

The guarantee offered by Techmar only applies to the buyer. If the buyer is a reseller, distributor or dealer recognised by Techmar, the product is also covered by the same guarantee. If so requested, the product must be returned by the buyer who appeals to the guarantee within the applicable guarantee period, so that after investigation, Techmar is able to determine whether the product concerned fails to comply with this guarantee. If a product does not perform in accordance with this guarantee, Techmar will provide a replacement for the defective product free of charge, or Techmar will, at its discretion, repair or replace the defective part of the product or refund the purchase price paid to the buyer. If Techmar opts for replacement of the product and it turns out that this is not possible due to the fact that it is no longer produced or not available, Techmar may refund the purchase amount or replace the product with a comparable product (which may slightly differ in design and product specifications).

No representative, distributor or dealer is authorised to replace, change or extend any aspect of the guarantee provisions on behalf of Techmar.

This guarantee does not apply to damage or non-performance due to force majeure or misuse, improper use, deviant use or use that violates applicable standards, regulations or instructions for use, including but not limited to those adopted in the latest safety, industry and/or electricity standards.

This guarantee is void if repairs or changes to the product are carried out by anyone whomsoever without written permission from Techmar.

The purchase or delivery date of the product must be clearly traceable. Techmar reserves the right to make a final decision regarding the validity of any guarantee claim. See also under 5: restrictions.

3. Guarantee claims

If delivery is carried out in stages (with or without commissioning) the guarantee period for the product concerned does not start on the purchase or delivery date, however on the invoice date, unless otherwise confirmed by Techmar.

No products are covered by these guarantee provisions if the buyer is in default according to the General Terms and Conditions with regard to his payment obligations.

For entitlement to a valid guarantee claim, the buyer must immediately inform Techmar or its representative (resale organisation, distributor or dealer) of any alleged defective product before the end of the guarantee period. Further to this, Techmar's obligations under this guarantee are subject to the following conditions:

The buyer must have proof of purchase for the Product available for inspection;

The buyer must, immediately and no later than thirty (30) days after discovery, submit claims under this guarantee to Techmar or its representative (resale organisation, distributor or dealer) and thereby supply at least the following information about the defective product:

- name and/or type number of the product;

- details about the (claimed) defect, including the number of faults;

- the applicable purchase, delivery or invoice date and details about the application, location, period of use (estimate of the number of actual burning hours) and anything else that may be needed for Techmar to assess the alleged defect;

- the buyer provides Techmar or Techmar’s representative (resale organisation, distributor or dealer) with the product, with regard to which the buyer appeals to these guarantee provisions, for further analysis if requested;

- any legal proceedings concerning any guarantee claim must be started within one (1) year after the date of the claim. Any claim that has not been reported or submitted in accordance with the preceding sentence is null and void.

At Techmar’s discretion, Techmar's guarantee obligations are limited to either the repair or the delivery of a replacement product of the defective product within a reasonable period of time, or to an appropriate refund of its purchase price.

Repairs, replacements or rectifications do not result in an extension or renewal of the applicable guarantee period. Techmar reserves the right, at its discretion, to replace a defective product covered by the guarantee with a product that slight differs in design and/or product specifications to the extent that the performance of the Product is not affected by it. Techmar may charge the buyer for the reasonable costs it has incurred with respect to an alleged defect or returned product that does not appear to be a defect, including reasonable costs for transport, testing and handling.

4. No tacit or other guarantees

The guarantee and remedies in the terms of the limited guarantee are the only guarantees provided by Techmar with regard to the products, and are provided in lieu of any other guarantees, whether express or implied, including but not limited to guarantees of merchantability or suitability for a specific purpose of use, which guarantees are hereby rejected.

These guarantee provisions state the full liability and obligation of Techmar in respect of the buyer and are the sole and exclusive remedy of the buyer in relation to defective or non-compliant products supplied by Techmar to the Buyer, regardless of whether the damage is based on a guarantee that is not explicitly mentioned in these terms and conditions, an unlawful act, a contract or other legal theory, even if Techmar has been informed or Techmar is aware of these defects.

5. Restrictions

Techmar does not guarantee whether or not products infringe any patent, trademark, copyright, design right or other right to the intellectual property of third parties, and with regard to any right of third parties, Techmar only transfers such rights to the extent Techmar holds such rights in respect of the buyer, provided that Techmar guarantees that it was not actually (or not reasonably) aware of such an infringement at the time of acceptance of the buyer's order.

Techmar has no guarantee obligations if it appears that an alleged defect has occurred as a result of the following:

Any form of force majeure or natural disaster. In the event and to the extent force majeure is not defined in the General Terms and Conditions, force majeure means and includes any circumstance or incident that is reasonably beyond Techmar’s control - whether or not these could be anticipated at the time of the agreement was concluded - and as a result of which Techmar cannot be required to fulfil its obligations, including force majeure or default on the part of Techmar’s suppliers.

Condition of the electrical supply including current peaks, over/undervoltage and ripple currents on control systems exceeding the specified limits of the product and that are established by relevant power standards (e.g. EN 50160 standards).

Incorrect wiring, installation or maintenance of products not carried out by (or for) Techmar.

Failure to comply with the Instructions or guidelines imposed by Techmar for the installation, operation, application, maintenance or environment or any other document that comes with the products or with the applicable safety, industry, and/or electricity standards or rules:

Failure to use the products for the purposes for which they were designed.

Exposure to excessive wear, lightning, neglect, negligence, accidents, misuse, abuse, improper or abnormal use of the products.

Any attempt to repair, change or alteration not approved in writing by Techmar.

Use of LED products without allowance for the application instructions with regard to possible contamination or cleaning.

title: Transformer Touch Cover
body_html: Have you mounted the Transformer Touch outdoors and do you want to protect it from the elements? Then this Cover gives the protection your transformer needs. The Cover is made of high-quality, durable plastic and slides easily over the Transformer Touch (both 100 and 150 watt).

title: Lightpro 12V Tiga DL 5W Wall Light
body_html:
The Tiga DL is a versatile and innovative light, designed to transform your garden. With its dimmable feature and a variety of installation options, this light is perfect for illuminating paths and adding a hidden touch of light to hedges. It also enhances safety when used on staircases.

• Perfect spotlight for illuminating a path
• Also suitable as a wall light
• Dimmable in 6 positions
• Illuminates up to 1 metre

Ready to get started? Here's your Lightpro Brochure - Follow pages 7 & 8 for your set up guide

title: Lightpro Wi-Fi Switch Smart
body_html:
Our smart (Zigbee) system enables you to make your 12-volt garden lights smart. Whether you already have a Lightpro system in the garden or are going for a whole new system! To control your lighting system, simply use the Switch Smart in combination with the app. Illuminate all or part of your garden at just the touch of a button. Because the settings can now be managed and changed remotely, it’s easy to make sure your lights never have to stay on unnecessarily. The Switch runs on Wi-Fi and is connected in no time.

• Enables activation and deactivation of non-smart light sources.
• Direct WiFi communication
• Install max. 30m from router

title: Lightpro 3 Way Splitter
body_html:
This cable divider is designed with three outlets for connecting multiple light fixtures. It is waterproof and thus perfect for the garden! With up to 150W of output power, it can handle a lot.

LightPro Connection System

The Lightpro 12V outdoor lighting system is easily installed by anyone. Simply run Lightpro main cabling around your garden. Connect the award winning Lightpro connectors to the main cable and plug in your lights. It's then simply a case of connecting your main cable to the transformer and plugging the transformer into a standard outdoor plug socket.

Fast, Simple & Safe

Warranty

From 1st April 2023 all complete Lightpro systems purchased come with a 6 year warranty.

Prior to this date, complete systems had a 5 year warranty. 

All Non Lightpro items come with a 12 months warranty.

Warranty provision

1. General

These guarantee provisions are to be read in conjunction with the prevailing General Terms and Conditions for the sale of Techmar lighting products or with any other terms and conditions agreed between Techmar and the buyer.

In addition to these guarantee provisions, the (General) Terms and Conditions of Techmar remain effective and legally valid. In the event of any discrepancies between these guarantee provisions and the (General) terms and conditions relating to the products, the guarantee provisions will prevail.

According to the conditions and provisos of the guarantee as specified below, Techmar guarantees that the products will be free of defects.

Under the terms of these guarantee provisions, a defect (or defective product) means that a product has a material or construction fault that makes it largely impossible for the product to perform in accordance with the agreed specifications. The buyer has a guarantee to the product during the guarantee period subject to the provisions below.

The guarantee applies to the LightPro outdoor lighting fixtures with accessories. The included light sources are hereby excluded.

The guarantee period for LightPro outdoor lighting fixtures with accessories comprises 6 years.

The guarantee only applies to products working in an ambient temperature of a minimum of -20 C and a maximum of + 50 C.

For end users/consumers, the guarantee period starts on the purchase date, for resale organisations, distributors or dealers, it starts on the delivery date.

The guarantee period no longer applies if/in case the specific product properties have been changed by others than those authorised by Techmar, or in case Techmar products are joined or connected to products other than Techmar products.

Dimming and the application of network-control systems affect the guarantee.

The guarantee only applies if the product is used, installed and maintained properly in accordance with our instructions in the product manual, where necessary allowing for the specific tolerances on luminous flux and system power as stated in the accompanying product documentation/manual.

The buyer cannot rely on any other information or documentation.

The products must have been purchased directly from Techmar or from a resale organisation, distributor or dealer of Techmar.

The proof of purchase of the products must be present and available to Techmar. The warranty only applies when a complete Lightpro system is installed.

2. Terms and conditions

The guarantee offered by Techmar only applies to the buyer. If the buyer is a reseller, distributor or dealer recognised by Techmar, the product is also covered by the same guarantee. If so requested, the product must be returned by the buyer who appeals to the guarantee within the applicable guarantee period, so that after investigation, Techmar is able to determine whether the product concerned fails to comply with this guarantee. If a product does not perform in accordance with this guarantee, Techmar will provide a replacement for the defective product free of charge, or Techmar will, at its discretion, repair or replace the defective part of the product or refund the purchase price paid to the buyer. If Techmar opts for replacement of the product and it turns out that this is not possible due to the fact that it is no longer produced or not available, Techmar may refund the purchase amount or replace the product with a comparable product (which may slightly differ in design and product specifications).

No representative, distributor or dealer is authorised to replace, change or extend any aspect of the guarantee provisions on behalf of Techmar.

This guarantee does not apply to damage or non-performance due to force majeure or misuse, improper use, deviant use or use that violates applicable standards, regulations or instructions for use, including but not limited to those adopted in the latest safety, industry and/or electricity standards.

This guarantee is void if repairs or changes to the product are carried out by anyone whomsoever without written permission from Techmar.

The purchase or delivery date of the product must be clearly traceable. Techmar reserves the right to make a final decision regarding the validity of any guarantee claim. See also under 5: restrictions.

3. Guarantee claims

If delivery is carried out in stages (with or without commissioning) the guarantee period for the product concerned does not start on the purchase or delivery date, however on the invoice date, unless otherwise confirmed by Techmar.

No products are covered by these guarantee provisions if the buyer is in default according to the General Terms and Conditions with regard to his payment obligations.

For entitlement to a valid guarantee claim, the buyer must immediately inform Techmar or its representative (resale organisation, distributor or dealer) of any alleged defective product before the end of the guarantee period. Further to this, Techmar's obligations under this guarantee are subject to the following conditions:

The buyer must have proof of purchase for the Product available for inspection;

The buyer must, immediately and no later than thirty (30) days after discovery, submit claims under this guarantee to Techmar or its representative (resale organisation, distributor or dealer) and thereby supply at least the following information about the defective product:

- name and/or type number of the product;

- details about the (claimed) defect, including the number of faults;

- the applicable purchase, delivery or invoice date and details about the application, location, period of use (estimate of the number of actual burning hours) and anything else that may be needed for Techmar to assess the alleged defect;

- the buyer provides Techmar or Techmar’s representative (resale organisation, distributor or dealer) with the product, with regard to which the buyer appeals to these guarantee provisions, for further analysis if requested;

- any legal proceedings concerning any guarantee claim must be started within one (1) year after the date of the claim. Any claim that has not been reported or submitted in accordance with the preceding sentence is null and void.

At Techmar’s discretion, Techmar's guarantee obligations are limited to either the repair or the delivery of a replacement product of the defective product within a reasonable period of time, or to an appropriate refund of its purchase price.

Repairs, replacements or rectifications do not result in an extension or renewal of the applicable guarantee period. Techmar reserves the right, at its discretion, to replace a defective product covered by the guarantee with a product that slight differs in design and/or product specifications to the extent that the performance of the Product is not affected by it. Techmar may charge the buyer for the reasonable costs it has incurred with respect to an alleged defect or returned product that does not appear to be a defect, including reasonable costs for transport, testing and handling.

The guarantee and remedies in the terms of the limited guarantee are the only guarantees provided by Techmar with regard to the products, and are provided in lieu of any other guarantees, whether express or implied, including but not limited to guarantees of merchantability or suitability for a specific purpose of use, which guarantees are hereby rejected.

Techmar does not guarantee whether or not products infringe any patent, trademark, copyright, design right or other right to the intellectual property of third parties, and with regard to any right of third parties, Techmar only transfers such rights to the extent Techmar holds such rights in respect of the buyer, provided that Techmar guarantees that it was not actually (or not reasonably) aware of such an infringement at the time of acceptance of the buyer's order.

Techmar has no guarantee obligations if it appears that an alleged defect has occurred as a result of the following:

Any form of force majeure or natural disaster. In the event and to the extent force majeure is not defined in the General Terms and Conditions, force majeure means and includes any circumstance or incident that is reasonably beyond Techmar’s control - whether or not these could be anticipated at the time of the agreement was concluded - and as a result of which Techmar cannot be required to fulfil its obligations, including force majeure or default on the part of Techmar’s suppliers.

Any attempt to repair, change or alteration not approved in writing by Techmar.

title: Lightpro 6m Sensor Extension Cable
body_html:
A 6-meter long extension cable for the purpose of the light sensor. Compatible with the 100W and 150W transformers. You can use up to two sensor extension cables in a row.

LightPro Connection System

The Lightpro 12V outdoor lighting system is easily installed by anyone. Simply run Lightpro main cabling around your garden. Connect the award winning Lightpro connectors to the main cable and plug in your lights. It's then simply a case of connecting your main cable to the transformer and plugging the transformer into a standard outdoor plug socket.

Fast, Simple & Safe

title: Lightpro 12V Rodas 3W IP65 Pendant Light
body_html:
Looking for a cozier mood in your garden? Then the warm white light of the Rodas is the perfect solution! This mood-enhancing strip consists of three lights and creates an enchanting light display, ideal for hanging from a pergola, under a canopy, in a tree or as a light strip along a wall. Hang up multiple lights for a wonderful effect! There is almost 3 meters of cable attached to each light.

Ready to get started? Here's your Lightpro Brochure - Follow pages 7 & 8 for your set up guide

12v low voltage lighting means that it is safe for animals & people and easy to install without the need for an electrician. 

All Lightpro fittings come with a female connector and a 6 year warranty when used within a complete Lightpro system.

Technical Info

Product Features

Construction Aluminium
Colour Anthracite
IP Rating IP65
Cable 3 metres
Dimensions 100mmx20mmx20mm
Weight N/A
Lamp Type SMD 12V LED (Non replaceable)
Lumen / Colour 44 / 3000K Warm White
Wattage 3.1W
Voltage 12V
Mounting Type N/A
System LightPro
Projected Lamp Lifetime 10,000 Hours
Warranty 6 Years


LightPro Connection System

The Lightpro 12V outdoor lighting system is easily installed by anyone. Simply run Lightpro main cabling around your garden. Connect the award winning Lightpro connectors to the main cable and plug in your lights. It's then simply a case of connecting your main cable to the transformer and plugging the transformer into a standard outdoor plug socket.

Fast, Simple & Safe

title: Lightpro Remote + Receiver
body_html:
The Lightpro Remote + Receiver gives you the flexibility to control your entire garden remotely or focus on specific sections. The remote includes 9 channels and can accommodate up to 8 additional receivers (Receiver sold separately). It requires 2x MN2400 AAA batteries.

title: Lightpro 12V Quartz Black IP44 Wall Light
body_html:
Looking for a modern outdoor wall lamp that effortlessly complements your existing outdoor lighting? Look no further than the Quartz, which can be mounted or used as a spot, providing a beautifully illuminated garden that aligns perfectly with contemporary design. With its adjustable head, you can easily highlight and accentuate any feature in your garden, from a lovely shrub to a charming pergola.

• Suitable for lighting a fence and wall or as a spotlight
• Ambience and accent lighting

Ready to get started? Here's your Lightpro Brochure - Follow pages 7 & 8 for your set up guide

12v low voltage lighting means that it is safe for animals & people and easy to install without the need for an electrician. 

All Lightpro fittings come with a female connector and a 6 year warranty when used within a complete Lightpro system.

Technical Info

Product Features

Construction Aluminium
Colour Black
IP Rating IP44
Cable 3 metre SPT-1 with connector
Dimensions 105mm x 50mm x 85mm
Weight N/A
Lamp Type MR11 LED non dimmable
Lumen / Colour 120 / 3000K Warm White
Wattage 2W
Voltage 12V
Mounting Type Spike & mounting base included
System LightPro
Warranty 6 Years

LightPro Connection System

The Lightpro 12V outdoor lighting system is easily installed by anyone. Simply run Lightpro main cabling around your garden. Connect the award winning Lightpro connectors to the main cable and plug in your lights. It's then simply a case of connecting your main cable to the transformer and plugging the transformer into a standard outdoor plug socket.

Fast, Simple & Safe

title: Lightpro 12V Onyx 90 RA IP67 Decking Light
body_html:
The Onyx 90 RA is perfect for accent and orientation lighting, and can be easily installed. With a warm white light source, it is versatile and suitable for various purposes. The decklight comes with milky glass, but you can choose to opt for clear glass by unscrewing the head of the Onyx. To adjust the brightness or prevent direct light, simply insert the included honeycomb into the Onyx. Enjoy the desired effect and create a welcoming atmosphere in your garden, even at night.

For a smaller option, check out the Onyx 30 RA or Onyx 60 RA.

• Ground spots that serve as an important orientation guide
• Suitable for illuminating a patio or path
• Overpassable
• Includes honeycomb against glare and stray light

title: Lightpro 12V Onyx 60 RA IP67 Decking Light
body_html:
The Onyx 60 RA offers various uses as accent and orientation lighting, and is effortless to install. Its source produces a warm white light, making it suitable for multiple purposes. The standard milky glass can be replaced with clear glass by simply unscrewing the head of the Onyx. For those who prefer less brightness or wish to avoid directly looking at the light, inserting the standard honeycomb into the Onyx is an option. This allows for customization and ensures the garden is illuminated with a desired mood during the evening. Those interested in a larger version can consider the Onyx 90 RA, while the smaller version can be found in the Onyx 30 RA.

• Ground spots that serve as an important orientation guide
• Suitable for illuminating a patio or path
• Overpassable
• Includes honeycomb against glare and stray light
• Standard includes matt glass

title: Lightpro 12V Onyx 30 RA IP67 Decking Light
body_html:

With its warm white light and easily customizable features, it is perfect for a variety of purposes. • Ground spots that serve as an important orientation guide

title: Lightpro 12V Onyx 20 Deck Light
body_html:
Onyx 20 is a subtle fixture that's barely visible during the day. With its warm white light, it provides very subtle orientation lighting in the evening. Onyx 20 is perfect for use along paths, stairs, and terraces.

• Ground spots that serve as an important orientation guide
• Suitable for illuminating a terrace or pathway

Ready to get started? Here's your Lightpro Brochure - Follow pages 7 & 8 for your set up guide

12v low voltage lighting means that it is safe for animals & people and easy to install without the need for an electrician. 

All Lightpro fittings come with a female connector and a 6 year warranty when used within a complete Lightpro system.

Technical Info

Product Features

Construction Plastic
Colour Clear
IP Rating IP67
Cable 1 metre rubber with connector
Dimensions 33mm x 20mm
Weight N/A
Lamp Type SMD LED non dimmable
Lumen / Colour 1 / 2700K
Wattage 0.25W
Voltage 12V
Mounting Type Drill Hole Ø 20mm
System LightPro
Projected Lamp Lifetime 25,000 hours
Warranty 6 Years

LightPro Connection System

The Lightpro 12V outdoor lighting system is easily installed by anyone. Simply run Lightpro main cabling around your garden. Connect the award winning Lightpro connectors to the main cable and plug in your lights. It's then simply a case of connecting your main cable to the transformer and plugging the transformer into a standard outdoor plug socket.

title: Lightpro 12V Oberon Lo 4W IP44 Dimmable Post Light
body_html:
The standing light remains a popular product within the outdoor lighting. It illuminates your terrace, driveway or footpath in an attractive way and ensures that you can enjoy your outdoor space much longer in the evening. The Oberon Lo fits perfectly with the Lightpro range. The Oberon Lo is the smaller version of the Oberon Hi. Both are standing lights with a dimming function, with which you set the light output in 6 different intensities. This standing garden light is the perfect addition to the rest of your outdoor lighting. Thanks to its sleek and simple appearance, the Oberon Lo matches everything and adds more atmosphere to your garden. It also illuminates the ground in a subtle way and ensures that you always have a good view of where you are walking.

• Ideal as orientation lighting
• Accentuate the driveway, pavement or place the luminaire next to a shrub or plant for a beautiful effect

Ready to get started? Here's your Lightpro Brochure - Follow pages 7 & 8 for your set up guide

title: Lightpro 12V Oberon SMART Low Voltage 5W IP44 Post Light
body_html:
The Oberon SMART incorporates a Zigbee (WiFi) light source, expanding our selection of intelligent products. Unlike conventional post lights, the Zigbee light system facilitates communication between all SMART enabled products.

By purchasing the Gateway, which converts WiFi to Zigbee, and pairing it with the Lightpro app, you can easily control your Oberon SMART lights. Simply place the lamp along a garden path, driveway, or border and pair it with the app for instant use. Be sure to keep the Oberon SMART within a 16-meter range of the Gateway or your other SMART lights, when adding it to the app.

Note: This product requires a Gateway SMART Hub, sold separately.

• Zigbee light source (RGB + CCT)
• Operable via Lightpro app
• Ideal as orientation lighting
• Accentuate the driveway, pavement or place the luminaire next to a shrub or plant for a beautiful effect

Ready to get started? Here's your Lightpro Brochure - Follow pages 7 & 8 for your set up guide
