title: Lightpro 12V Nomia 3W IP67 Uplight
body_html:
The Nomia uplight is expertly designed for illuminating low to medium-sized trees. It produces a warm white light that reaches a height of just over three meters, making it perfect for outdoor spaces. Its convenient spike stands allow for easy placement in any type of soil. Use the Nomia near low to medium-high trees, statues, or taller grasses to create a welcoming ambiance in your garden. With its advanced SMD led light source, it emits an inviting warm white light.

• Powerful light source for highlighting a tree or object
• Illuminates up to 3.3 metres

title: Lightpro 12V Nilus 4W IP68 Spotlight
body_html:
The Nilus is a reliable and versatile underwater spotlight that's comparable to the Castor and Juno models. Featuring an impressive IP68 protection rating, allowing for permanent use up to half a meter underwater. The light can be securely positioned in a pond using its weighted base, or easily attached to a solid surface with the included screws and plugs. Its SMD LED light source produces a warm white light, making it perfect for creating an underwater scene with ease, speed, and safety.

• Underwater spotlight
• Adjustable
• Illuminates up to 3 metres

Ready to get started? Here's your Lightpro Brochure - Follow pages 7 & 8 for your set up guide

12v low voltage lighting means that it's safe for animals & people, and easy to install without the need for an electrician. 

All Lightpro fittings come with a female connector and a 6 year warranty when used within a complete Lightpro system.

title: Lightpro SMART Motion Sensor
body_html:
Enhance garden safety and prevent unwanted visitors with the wireless Zigbee motion sensor. Communication between products ensures a limitless range, with a maximum distance of 20 metres. For optimal performance, the motion sensor should be no more than 16 metres away from the Gateway when added to the app.

• Motion sensor for outdoor use;
• Combines motion with smart outdoor lighting;
• IP65 certified product;
• Detects motion up to 10m;
• Detection angle 120°;
• Configurable sensitivity (3 levels);
• Internal twilight sensor to conserve battery power;
• Installation with magnets;
• Battery operated (2x AAA);

Need help? Click below for the step-by-step videos on setting up this product. 

Setting up a zone 

Connecting a single light

Pairing the sensor to the app

The Lightpro SMART Motion Sensor allows for the use of non-smart lights to be turned on through the use of the Lightpro WiFi Switch Smart (Sold Separately).

title: Lightpro 12V 4W Juno Tube Spotlight
body_html:
The Lightpro Juno Tube is a spotlight, for use with the LightPro 12V Tube - see the link below:

Lightpro 12V Tube

Utilize the Juno Tube spotlight by mounting it onto the Juno Tube and inserting it into the ground with a ground spike, or affix it to a wall. The Juno Tube is available separately as an accessory. Easily attach corresponding spots to the Tube for versatile use. Choose to attach the ground spike to the bar for lighting your plants from above, or aiming at taller plants. Alternatively, attach the bar to a wall and aim the spot at plants below, or place the tube on a fence for adjustable illumination.

• Perfect spotlight for lighting trees, shrubs or plants
• Also suitable as wall lighting
• Adjustable
• Illuminates up to 5 metres
• The Juno Tube spotlights only fit the Tube
• The Tube is available separately

Ready to get started? Here's your Lightpro brochure - Follow pages 7 & 8 for your set up guide

All Lightpro fittings come with a female connector and a 6 year warranty when used within a complete Lightpro system.

title: Lightpro 230 Volt Ixion IP44 Up/Down Wall Light
body_html:
The Ixion Small 230V is a versatile wall light that combines style and functionality. Its dual lighting design provides both ambient and focused illumination, allowing for easy adjustment of light angle and brightness. This makes it perfect for creating unique lighting effects in your garden. With two light sources and an easy wall-mounting system, this light is ideal for use with multiple units on a long wall or fence. Just make sure to connect it to a 230V power source.

• 230 volts wall light
• Suitable for illuminating a fence and wall
• Ambience and accent lighting
• Gives an upward and/or downward light image

Ready to get started? Here's your Lightpro Brochure - Follow pages 7 & 8 for your set up guide

title: Lightpro 12V Ixion 9W IP44 Up/Down Dimmable Wall Light
body_html:
The Ixion is both stylish and functional, making it an ideal wall light for any garden interior. It offers the unique feature of providing light in both upward and downward directions, allowing you to easily adjust the light angle to your preference. With six different dimming settings, this wall light can also create special effects when combined with other lights on a long wall or fence. Its simple attachment to the wall makes it a convenient choice for illuminating any space. Additionally, the Ixion contains two light sources for maximum brightness.

title: Lightpro Gateway SMART Hub
body_html:
The Lightpro Gateway, utilizing Zigbee technology, offers a reliable and efficient network. By connecting the Gateway first, you can easily add the Oberon and Castor smart lights as well as the Motion Sensor Smart. title: Lightpro 12V Deco 2 3W IP44 Outdoor / Garden Light
body_html:
Transform your outdoor space into a relaxing oasis with Lightpro's 12V Deco 2 3W IP44 Outdoor / Garden Light. Relax and enjoy the sunset with this remote-controlled light, allowing control of the perfect ambiance, with a variety of colors to choose from. Designed for convenience and comfort, simply control the lighting from the comfort of your chair.

• Easily movable
• Weatherproof
• Remote control included

Ready to get started? Here's your Lightpro Brochure - Follow pages 7 & 8 for your set up guide

12v low voltage lighting means that it is safe for animals and people and easy to install without the need for an electrician. 

All Lightpro fittings come with a female connector and a 6 year warranty when used within a complete Lightpro system.

Technical Info

Product Features

Construction Polyethylene
Colour White
IP Rating IP44
Cable 1.5 metre rubber with connector
Dimensions (Ø) 400mm
Lamp Type RGB
Lumen / Colour 65 / Colour Changing RGB
Voltage 12V
System LightPro
Projected Lamp Lifetime 10,000 Hours
Warranty 6 Years


LightPro Connection System

The Lightpro 12V outdoor lighting system is easily installed by anyone. Simply run Lightpro main cabling around your garden. Connect the award winning Lightpro connectors to the main cable and plug in your lights. It's then simply a case of connecting your main cable to the transformer and plugging the transformer into a standard outdoor plug socket.

Fast, Simple & Safe

title: Connector Type M (Male)
body_html:
Lightpro male connector for use with the Lightpro range of lighting. The male connector is primarily used with a female connector 137a, when forming a branch off the main cable run and needed when using an off-cut of Lightpro cable and plugging it into a 3 way splitter.

The Male connector will also be needed when the new 100w & 150w transformer arrive in late 2023 as they will have a standard female outlet. 

Heavy duty clamp on, award winning connector that will form a 100% reliable electrical and mechanical connection to power your light.  

This male connector (Type M) is connected to the 12 volt cable in order to be able to connect the cable to make branches.

title: Connector Type F (Female)
body_html:
Lightpro female connector for use with Lightpro cabling and lights. All Lightpro lights come with a 137a female connector included, but you may need a 137a + 138a, male connector when forming a branch off the main run of cable. 

Heavy duty clamp on award winning connector that will form a 100% reliable electrical and mechanical connection to power your light.  

LightPro Connection System

title: Lightpro 12V Castor SMART Low Voltage 5W IP44 Spotlight
body_html:
Utilizing a Zigbee light source, the Castor Smart offers the advantage of communication between products, providing limitless range. By pairing the Gateway (which converts WiFi to Zigbee) with the Lightpro app, you can easily control the Castor Smart to illuminate in a color of your choice. Whether it be blue, red, or a warm white light, the Lightpro app allows for effortless customization of brightness and on/off timing. Simply ensure that the Castor Smart is within 16 meters of the Gateway for seamless integration with the app.

Note: This product requires a Gateway SMART Hub, sold separately.

• Zigbee light source (RGB + CCT)
• Perfect spotlight for lighting trees, shrubs or plants
• Adjustable
• Control via the Lightpro app
• Illuminates up to 5 metres

Optional Anti-Glare Hood

12v low voltage lighting means that it is safe for animals & people and easy to install without the need for an electrician. 

All Lightpro fittings come with a female connector and a 6 year warranty when used within a complete Lightpro system.

Technical Info

Product Features

Construction Aluminium
Colour Anthracite
IP Rating IP44
Cable 1 metre
Dimensions 95mm x 60mm x 120mm
Weight N/A
Lamp Type TBA (Non replaceable)
Lumen / Colour 300 / 2700K- 6500l + RGB
Wattage 5W
Voltage 12V
Mounting Type Ground Spike
System LightPro
Projected Lamp Lifetime 25,000 hours
Warranty 6 Years

LightPro Connection System

The Lightpro 12V outdoor lighting system is easily installed by anyone. Simply run Lightpro main cabling around your garden. Connect the award winning Lightpro connectors to the main cable and plug in your lights. It's then simply a case of connecting your main cable to the transformer and plugging the transformer into a standard outdoor plug socket.

title: Lightpro 12V Castor 9 9W IP44 Dimmable Spot Light
body_html:
The versatile Castor 9 garden spotlight features a dimmable function for customizable brightness, making it perfect for all seasons. Utilizing a directional light beam, this spotlight is ideal for highlighting specific objects such as trees or shrubs. Crafted from aluminium with a matte anthracite powder coating, this spotlight has a standard light angle of 60 degrees and the option to create a 30 degree angle with the included reflector. With a power consumption of 9 W, it measures 9.5 cm high and 14 cm wide.

Bring attention to what you're proud of with the Castor 9. An added dimension for extended outdoor enjoyment.

• Perfect spotlight for lighting trees, shrubs or plants
• Adjustable
• Dimmable in 6 positions
• Illuminates up to 15 metres

Ready to get started? Here's your Lightpro Brochure - Follow pages 7 & 8 for your set up guide

title: Lightpro 12V Castor 4 3.5W IP67 Dimmable Spot Light
body_html:

Made of aluminum with a matt anthracite powder coating, it measures 9.5 cm high and 12 cm wide. This spot is perfect for accent lighting, highlighting important elements that need to be illuminated. With its dimmable feature, it maintains optimal light efficiency year-round as you can adjust the light intensity to your liking.

title: Lightpro SMART Wi-Fi Camera
body_html:
The Lightpro SMART Wi-Fi Camera is a 12-volt device designed to seamlessly integrate into our system. Boasting a 2 megapixel lens, it can detect motion up to 10 metres away with a 65-degree angle of detection. With the option to store data in the Cloud or add a micro SD card (not included), you'll have plenty of space for video footage. Use the app to review footage or communicate with individuals at your front door. The camera also features IR night vision and an integrated PIR motion sensor that activates lights upon detection of movement. Easily control all settings through the Lightpro app.

Functioning of the camera
• 2MP camera for outdoor use
• 15 frames per second
• Cloud data storage
• (optional) Local storage on micro SD card
• IP65 certified product
• Night vision (IR)
• Combines motion with smart outdoor lighting
• PIR motion sensor included
• Detects motion up to 10m
• Detection angle 65°
• Sensitivity adjustable
• Install max. 40m from router

title: Lightpro 12V Barite 60 3W IP44 Outdoor / Garden Post Light
body_html:
The Barite 60 outdoor post light is a noteworthy addition to any garden or outdoor space. It is the taller counterpart of the Barite 40 post light and consumes 3W, standing at a height of 57.5 cm. Crafted from aluminum, it is available in black and emits a warm white light. This floor lamp is perfect for providing orientation lighting, such as lining a pathway. It effectively highlights the depth of a garden at night. For lower plantings, the Barite 40 is recommended, while for higher plantings, the Barite 60 is recommended.

title: Lightpro 12V Atik SMART Low Voltage 5W IP67 Ground Light
body_html:
The Atik Smart features a Zigbee light source, which allows for a continuous range of communication between products. With a maximum distance of 20 meters between products and a Gateway converter for Wi-Fi to Zigbee, control the Atik Smart with the new Lightpro app. Choose from various colors, brightness levels, and scheduling options all from the convenience of your smartphone. Keep in mind that the Atik Smart should be no more than 16 meters away from the Gateway when adding it to the app.

Note: This product requires a Gateway SMART Hub, sold separately.

• Zigbee light source (RGB + CCT)
• Operable via the Lightpro app
• Powerful light source for highlighting a tree or object
• Illuminates up to 5 metres

title: Lightpro 12V Atik R1 9W Dimmable Ground Light
body_html:
The Atik R1 has a consumption of 9W and a diameter of 12 cm. It is made of aluminum and is available in black. This uplight is dimmable and has a warm, white light source.
The light emission can be compared to the large spot (Castor 9), which gives even more light than the Agate. This uplight is dimmable, giving you the desired light efficiency all year long, because you can determine the light intensity yourself. The light source can also be rotated so that the light angle can be set as desired.

• Powerful light source for highlighting a tree or object
• Illuminates up to 15 metres
• Dimmable

title: Lightpro 12V Agate 3W LED IP67 Outdoor / Garden Uplight
body_html:
The Agate has a consumption of 3W and is made of Stainless steel. Because the Agate has a height of 11.3 cm and 11.3 cm in diameter, it is easily hideable. The Agate can be used when you want to highlight a driveway or when the decklights are not sufficient in their light efficiency. Due to its strong light emission, it can be a good solution in situations in which a lot of light is desired. The uplight is available in black and has a stainless steel ring.

• Powerful light source for highlighting a tree or object
• Illuminates up to 3.5 metres

Ready to get started? Here's your Lightpro Brochure - Follow pages 7 & 8 for your set up guide

All Lightpro fittings come with a female connector and a 6 year warranty when used within a complete Lightpro system.

Technical Info

Construction Stainless Steel
Colour Stainless Steel
IP Rating IP67
Cable 0.5 metre rubber with connector
Dimensions 115 x 115
Weight 6193011
Lamp Type MR16 LED non-dimmable
Lumen / Colour 190 / 300K Warm White
Voltage 12V
Mounting Type Ground (70mm cut out)
System LightPro
Projected Lamp Lifetime 10,000 Hours
Warranty 6 Years


LightPro Connection System

The Lightpro 12V outdoor lighting system is easily installed by anyone. Simply run the Lightpro main cabling around your garden. Connect the award winning Lightpro connectors to the main cable and plug in your lights. It's then simply a case of connecting your main cable to the transformer and plugging the transformer into a standard outdoor plug socket.

Fast, Simple & Safe

Installation Video

Take a look at how you can install your own Garden Lighting System, saving both time and money! 

*12v System only. 230v must be installed by a qualified electrician.

Warranty

From 1st April 2023 all complete Lightpro systems purchased come with a 6 year warranty.

Prior to this date, complete systems had a 5 year warranty. 

All Non Lightpro items come with a 12 months warranty.

Warranty provision

1. General

These guarantee provisions are to be read in conjunction with the prevailing General Terms and Conditions for the sale of Techmar lighting products or with any other terms and conditions agreed between Techmar and the buyer.

In addition to these guarantee provisions, the (General) Terms and Conditions of Techmar remain effective and legally valid. In the event of any discrepancies between these guarantee provisions and the (General) terms and conditions relating to the products, the guarantee provisions will prevail.

According to the conditions and provisos of the guarantee as specified below, Techmar guarantees that the products will be free of defects.

Under the terms of these guarantee provisions, a defect (or defective product) means that a product has a material or construction fault that makes it largely impossible for the product to perform in accordance with the agreed specifications. The buyer has a guarantee to the product during the guarantee period subject to the provisions below.

The guarantee applies to the LightPro outdoor lighting fixtures with accessories. The included light sources are hereby excluded.

The guarantee period for LightPro outdoor lighting fixtures with accessories comprises 6 years.

The guarantee only applies to products working in an ambient temperature of a minimum of -20 C and a maximum of + 50 C.

For end users/consumers, the guarantee period starts on the purchase date, for resale organisations, distributors or dealers, it starts on the delivery date.

The guarantee period no longer applies if/in case the specific product properties have been changed by others than those authorised by Techmar, or in case Techmar products are joined or connected to products other than Techmar products.

Dimming and the application of network-control systems affect the guarantee.

The guarantee only applies if the product is used, installed and maintained properly in accordance with our instructions in the product manual, where necessary allowing for the specific tolerances on luminous flux and system power as stated in the accompanying product documentation/manual.

The buyer cannot rely on any other information or documentation.

The proof of purchase of the products must be present and available to Techmar. The warranty only applies when a complete Lightpro system is installed.

title: Broadfield 8x6 Super Pent Garden Shed
body_html:
The Super Pent shed has a modern practical design. It can be made in various sizes, allowing for design flexibility. 

Assembly & Treatment

You must ensure that this garden building is assembled strictly in accordance with the assembly instructions that are provided and is installed on a firm and level base constructed from a suitably durable material.

The garden building should be treated shortly after assembly, both externally and internally, with a good quality wood preserver and treated with a water-resistant treatment. Treatment should be reapplied annually to prolong the life of your building. All glazing units must be sealed, inside and out with silicone or other watertight solution of your choice (not supplied).

Disclaimer

title: Broadfield 8x8 Shiplap Summerhouse
body_html:
This Broadfield Summerhouse is a beautiful example of our Summerhouse range, with a sturdy construction and classic charm. Perfect for any garden, it offers a bright interior and the ideal retreat during the warmer months.

Crafted from top-quality timber and reinforced with 44mm x 28mm four corner framing, the Summerhouse boasts a sturdy and stylish structure. Its 12mm thick tongue and groove roof, floor, and shiplap cladding offer both durability and charm. Broadfield is dedicated to using only the best European softwood from sustainable sources, treating it with a protective water-based preservative in Burnt Orange to defend against rot, decay, and insects.

Handcrafted by skilled joiners for superior quality, the elegant windows come equipped with a secure lock and key for added peace of mind. The durable black mineral felt roof ensures leak-proof protection, while the generous roof overhang and decorative wings offer both style and protection. Featuring steel hinges and a door pull with a charming coating, this summerhouse is sure to impress.

Assembly & Treatment

You must ensure that this garden building is assembled strictly in accordance with the assembly instructions that are provided and is installed on a firm and level base constructed from a suitably durable material.

The garden building should be treated shortly after assembly, both externally and internally, with a good quality wood preserver and treated with a water-resistant treatment. All glazing units must be sealed, inside and out with silicone or other watertight solution of your choice (not supplied).

title: Broadfield 5x3 Premium Toolshed
body_html:
Looking for the perfect storage solution that won't overcrowd your garden? Look no further than our Broadfield 5x3 Premium Toolshed! With a beautiful and traditional design, this toolshed offers both practicality and convenience. It's the ideal addition to any outdoor space.

Crafted from premium timber with 44mm x 28mm four corner framing, the Broadfield 5x3 Premium Toolshed is built for sturdy structural support. Its superior grade, 12mm thick tongue and groove roof, floor, and shiplap cladding not only showcase quality construction but also provide durability and an attractive appearance. Using only the finest European softwood from sustainable sources, Broadfield takes pride in their products. The timber is treated with a Burnt Orange water based preservative, offering effective protection against rot, decay, and insect infestation, ensuring your toolshed remains in great condition for years to come.

The Toolshed offers a practical solution for storing tools, gardening equipment, and more. It even comes with a built-in lock for added security and a durable roof to protect against leaks. Its strong construction and tall design make it ideal for storing larger items. An ideal addition to all homes, offering style and practicality in a conveniently compact package.

The Kingsley combines a unique and striking design with fantastic all round build quality. The Kingsley 28mm Pent Log Cabin creates an outdoor room, gym area, summerhouse or garden office – the opportunities are endless. The building is filled with superb and stylish features making it ideal for those yearning for an outside area with ample internal space in attractive and secure surroundings.

Assembly & Treatment

You must ensure that this garden building is assembled strictly in accordance with the assembly instructions that are provided and is installed on a firm and level base constructed from a suitably durable material.

The garden building should be treated shortly after assembly, both externally and internally, with a good quality wood preserver and treated with a water-resistant treatment. Treatment should be reapplied annually to prolong the life of your building. All glazing units must be sealed, inside and out with silicone or other watertight solution of your choice (not supplied).

Delivery

Unfortunately, due to the construction of the pre-made panels for this Log Cabin, delivery is currently unavailable for the following postcodes: 
BT Northern Ireland, AB Aberdeen, DD Dundee, DT Dorchester (DT1-8), EX Exeter (EX17-23, 31-39), *FK Falkirk (FK14-21), IV Inverness, KW Kirkwall, *KY Kirkaldy (KY1-2, 5-10, 13-16), *PA Paisley (PA20-78), PH Perth, *PL Plymouth (PL10-20, 22-35), *PO Isle Of Wight(offshore), SA Swansea, *TQ Torquay (TQ8, 13), TR Truro.

Disclaimer

Images and photos of products are provided for illustrative purposes only. Please note that product colours can vary slightly due to the digital photography process and variations in individual user monitor settings.

title: 10 x 6 Staffordshire Dog Kennel & Run
body_html:
Experience peace of mind knowing your furry friend has a cozy and secure home in the 10 x 6 Staffordshire Dog Kennel & Run.

Made in the UK with sustainable timber, this dog house has two parts - a spacious sheltered area and a large mesh space - connected by a stable door. Your dog can freely choose between relaxing outside or snuggling up inside. The full height roof provides a light and airy feel while also making maintenance a breeze.

Constructed with sturdy 12mm interlocking Shiplap tongue and groove boards, this dog kennel & run boasts a durable structure that will provide reliable use for years to come. The smooth and strong interlocking boards used for the floor ensure a premium, high-grade finish. The entire building is covered by a solid sheet board roof and topped with high-quality mineral felt for long-lasting weatherproof protection. To ensure maximum security, the mesh access door is equipped with a high-quality padbolt and turn buttons.

Please note, this building must be assembled on a firm, level base such as concrete or concrete slabs.

  • Treatment Type: Dip Treated
  • People Req'd To Build: 2
  • 10 Year Guarantee

title: 8 x 6 Staffordshire Dog Kennel & Run
body_html:
This 8 x 6 Staffordshire dog kennel and run is perfect for anyone seeking an outdoor shelter that will provide comfort, safety, and security for their dog.

Constructed in the UK using responsibly sourced timber, this wooden pet house and run features two parts: an open mesh area at the front and a roomy shelter at the back. Connected by a stable door, your dog can freely move between enjoying the outdoors and cozying up inside. With a full height roof, this kennel is not only spacious and airy, but also easy to maintain and clean.

Crafted with 12mm interlocking Shiplap tongue and groove boards, the walls of this kennel and run offer a sturdy structure that will stand the test of time. The floor is also made with durable interlocking boards, ensuring a top-quality finish. The entire building is covered with a solid sheet board roof and high-quality mineral felt, providing reliable weatherproof protection. Complete with a sturdy padbolt and turn buttons for added security, the mesh access door makes for easy entry.

For proper construction, this building should be placed on a firm and level base, such as concrete or concrete slabs.

title: 10 x 4 Berkshire Dog Run & Kennel
body_html:
Keep your furry friend safe and comfortable in the warmer months with our 10 x 4 Mercia Dog Run & Kennel. The front panel is made from galvanised mesh to prevent rust and any escape attempts, while still allowing plenty of light and fresh air inside.

Made with 12mm Tongue & Groove cladding, this structure is strong and durable for years to come. Two doors provide easy access, and a small doorway connects the sheltered area and run for unrestricted movement. The galvanised mesh in the front adds to the longevity of the building, while the 28mm x 28mm interior framing and mineral roof felt provide protection against harsh weather.

The floor tiles are removable for easy cleaning, and a drain hole prevents water build-up. Plus, with a ten year anti rot guarantee, our sustainably sourced and UK-made product will provide peace of mind for years to come. Recommended for smaller dogs.

title: Store More Ashley Pent Log Cabin Garden Room - Choose Size
body_html:
Upgrade your outdoor space with the versatile Ashley Pent Garden Room Cabin - a sleek and sturdy addition to any garden.

Customize the spacious interior for a home office, gym, studio, or relaxing haven. Available in three sizes and featuring a pent roof design, the cabin offers ample headroom and protection from the elements.

Constructed with durable tongue-and-groove cladding and topped with mineral felt, with the option for pressure-treated wood. Easy assembly and equipped for safety.

Design insights

  • Modern and minimalist pent design with plenty of headroom
  • 44mm Interlocking Tongue & Groove log boards
  • Front overhang
  • Heavy duty 19mm Tongue and Groove floor & roof
  • Wide central double doors
  • Toughened glass double-glazed opening windows
  • Secure mortice lock system
  • Green Mineral protective roofing felt
  • Untreated or Pressure Treated

Full Details

This versatile Ashley Pent Garden Room Cabin is a perfect addition to any garden, providing both style and functionality.

The contemporary design adds a touch of sophistication to any outdoor setting, while the 44mm thick interlocking log cladding gives the cabin a sleek finish and sturdy external shell.

Whatever the weather, you can stay comfortable in the spacious indoor area, which can be used as a home office, gym, studio, or simply a place to relax.

The standout feature of the Ashley Log Cabin is its large interior room that can be customized to fit your specific needs. It is available in three different sizes, ranging from 4.0x3.0m to 5.0x4.0m, giving you flexibility in both size and budget.

With a pent roof design, the Ashley offers ample headroom, giving you the freedom to utilize the space however you please. The roof also extends at the front to create an overhang, providing extra protection for the front facade. 

Constructed from 19mm thick tongue-and-groove cladding panels, both the floor and roof of the Ashley Pent Log Cabin Garden Room provide reliable protection against harsh weather conditions. The roof is topped with protective green mineral felt, ensuring added durability.

For even more peace of mind, the option for pressure-treated wood is available. This process infuses the wood with chemical preservatives, keeping it stronger for longer.

Access to the cabin is made easy through a double door with double-glazed panels, while two large side windows allow natural light to flood in. The building is equipped with a secure mortice locking system and toughened glass materials for maximum safety. Assembly of the cabin is a breeze, even without a professional installation service. With the help of at least two people, the Ashley can be easily and quickly put together without any hassle.

title: Absco Bike Store - 7ft x 3ft
body_html:
This Absco Bike Store is perfect for storing bicycles or smaller outdoor equipment. The double hinged doors and skillion roof provide easy access to belongings. Its compact size makes it ideal for limited space.

Made in Australia from pre-assembled metal panels utilizing Snap-Tite construction, it is strong and durable. The zinc colourbond finish adds to its durability and weather-resistance. In addition, the metal used is rust and water-resistant.

A 20-year warranty is included, showcasing the product's longevity. This bike store can withstand harsh weather conditions and can be anchored to the ground for added stability. With a sloped pent roof, rainwater simply runs off, keeping belongings dry and secure.

For a solid, secure, and low maintenance storage solution, consider the Absco Bike Store.

title: 10 x 10 Premium Shiplap Apex Workshop
body_html:
The 10 x 10 Shiplap Apex Workshop is a flexible and customizable space. It features interchangeable panels, allowing you to easily choose where your doors and windows should be placed. The interior is spacious and bright, perfect for workbenches and tool storage.

Made in the UK with sustainable timber, this sturdy workshop has shiplap walls for weather resistance and an attractive finish. The thick wooden framing and heavy-duty tongue and groove boards make it durable for long-term use.

Design Insights

  • Simple self assembly – This product includes high-quality roofing felt and fixtures, along with comprehensive instructions, to facilitate a hassle-free and straightforward construction process.
  • Modular – This workshop boasts a modular design, making it perfect for those seeking flexibility. With the option to switch the window panel with the door or have both windows on one side, this building can be easily constructed to fit your preference of size.

Assembly

This workshop comes with high-quality mineral felt, durable fixtures, and reliable fittings as standard. Additionally, the thorough instructions make building easy and worry-free.

title: Store More Welbeck Reverse Apex Garden Office - Choose Size
body_html:
The Welbeck Garden Office is a stylish and practical choice for your home or business workspace.

It offers a spacious interior and a reverse apex roof for added headroom.

The flexible design allows for multiple use options, such as a home gym or hobby room.

Constructed with durable 44mm interlocking wood panels, this office also features large, secure windows and a locking system for added safety. No professional installation is needed, and it can be easily assembled by two people. You’ll be surprised by just how easy and fast it is to make!

Design insights

  • Tall Reverse Apex roof
  • Internal wall creates 2 separate spaces on two larger sizes
  • 44mm Interlocking Tongue & Groove log boards
  • Heavy duty 19mm Tongue and Groove floor & roof
  • A secure mortice lock system
  • 6ft high, reaching offset double door
  • Toughened glass double-glazed opening windows
  • Green Mineral protective roofing felt
  • Untreated or Pressure Treated

Full Details

The Welbeck Garden Office is the ideal workspace attachment to your home and garden. Available in three spacious designs, and complete with a tall reverse apex roof which provides lots of headroom, the Welbeck is a stylish and practical choice for your home or business office space.

At 6ft tall from the bottom of the gables, this Garden Office cabin is designed to be accommodating. The interior space is spacious and able to be easily divided. With the bigger sizes this is even incorporated into the design, with two internal rooms separated by a partition wall to create individual workspaces.

While the Welbeck is designed to be used as a Garden Office, there’s really no limit to how you can use it. Utilise the internal area as a home gym, art or crafts studio, hobby room, and more - with this much space, there’s no limit to what you can do with it!

The reverse apex roof provides a traditional character to the building, which works in conjunction with the modern-styled windows to create a balanced aesthetic. The windows and glazed doors are large and wide, allowing in large amounts of natural light, but are robust and secure thanks to the double-glazed toughened glass.

We’ve designed this garden office with 44mm interlocking wood panels, which provide a strong and durable construction. The floor and roof are also built to be strong and are made of 19mm tongue-and-groove panels of the same design. We then top the roof with a protective green mineral felt. The Welbeck also comes complete with an in-built mortice locking system, ensuring that your belongings are kept safe and secure.

There’s no installation service necessary with this Log Cabin. The Welbeck is built to be constructed, by hand, by at least two people. You’ll be surprised by just how easy and fast it is to make!

title: Store More Darton Pent Log Cabin Summerhouse with Side Store - Choose Size
body_html:
Our Darton Summerhouse offers versatility and convenience with separate indoor and storage spaces, making it a cabin, shed, and summerhouse all in one.

It is built with robust, 28mm interlocking tongue and groove log cladding boards, and features a mineral felt roof and high-strength SAN styrene glazing.

The option for pressure-treatment ensures long-lasting strength and protection against water.

The dual spaces allow for endless possibilities, whether used separately or together.

The side storage unit has an adjustable partition wall for added versatility. Available in 12x8ft or 14x8ft sizes and can be easily assembled by hand with at least two people.

Design insights

  • Full-length double doors
  • 28mm Tongue and Groove Log Thickness
  • Side Store with adjustable interior wall
  • 11mm Tongue and Groove Roof
  • 19mm Tongue and Groove Floor
  • High Strength SAN Styrene glazing
  • Green Mineral protective roofing felt
  • Untreated or Pressure Treated

Full Details

Our Darton Log Cabin Summerhouse brings versatility and comfort to your garden. With a separate indoor room and storage space combined into a single structure, you’re getting a cabin, shed, and summerhouse in one fantastic package! 

A robust, secure building is assured with the Darton. Crafted from 28mm interlocking tongue and groove log cladding boards, with panels of the same design for the roof and floor, the building can effortlessly stand up to turbulent weather. Extra protection is afforded by the mineral felt roof covering. Even the glazed doors, which let natural light stream indoors, are made from high-strength SAN styrene glazing.

For additional protection and longevity, you can choose to have your Darton cabin pressure-treated. This involves injecting the wood with a chemical preservative which protects against water ingress and ensures the wood remains continually strong.

With the Darton, you’ve got free range to furnish and use the dual spaces as you see fit, while having them connected opens up possibilities other cabins just don’t have. 

Go down the classic route and utilise each space for a separate purpose - use the indoor room for a relaxing lounge while the storage unit holds your garden furniture. Or use them in a connected way - such as a small design studio and an accompanying workshop. The possibilities are endless.

The side storage unit is divided from the indoor room by a partition wall. This wall is adjustable and allows the storage to be either increased or decreased in size depending on your needs and preferences, giving you amazing versatility with the building and how you use it. The cabin itself comes in two sizes, either 12x8ft or 14x8ft, allowing you to choose a model that fits your preferences.

There’s no installation service needed as the Darton is designed to be built by hand. With at least two people working together, the Darton can be assembled easily and quicker than you would think!

title: Saffron 8x5ft Vinyl Garden Shed with Foundation Kit
body_html:
The Saffron 8x5ft Vinyl Garden Shed is crafted with an apex roof and constructed using fire retardant PVC materials. It boasts a sturdy hot-dipped galvanised steel frame and features a skylight for natural light, vents for ventilation, and double doors for easy access. This shed is the perfect blend of durability and aesthetics, making it an ideal storage solution for any garden.

Design Insights

  • 10 Year Warranty
  • Durable vinyl
  • Apex roof
  • Wide 60″ double doors
  • Wind tested up to 115 mph (when anchored to the ground)
  • Snow tested for 20lbs/sqft load
  • Low maintenance - Won’t rust, rot, dent or mildew
  • Fire retardant
  • Skylights included
  • Pad-lockable

Full Info

The Saffron 8x5ft Vinyl Garden Shed with Foundation Kit is a high-quality outdoor storage solution for your garden.

Made from fire retardant PVC and a hot-dipped galvanised steel frame, this shed offers a rust and maintenance free storage option for a minimum warranty period of 10 years. 

Its shiplap walls and moulded PVC doors give it a neat and smart appearance. With double doors for easy access and significant air circulation, this plastic shed is ideal for storing garden equipment such as lawn mowers and tools. While there is no air vent, the high-grade materials and additional features such as vents and a skylight, make this a superior choice compared to other lightweight garden sheds on the market.

Plus, with pad-lockable hinge doors and internal locking bolts, your stored items will be safe and secure. Whether you have a small or large outdoor space, this apex roofed shed is the perfect storage solution.

title: Globel 6x4ft Low Pent Metal Garden Shed - Choose Colour
body_html:
The Globel Low Pent 6'x 4' Metal Shed is the perfect outdoor storage solution - attractive, strong, and long-lasting. Made from high-tensile, hot-dipped galvanised steel, you can trust that this shed will stand the test of time.

Design insights

  • Highest specification lightweight metal garden shed on the market
  • High grade 0.3mm steel and paint finish
  • Ventilated gables
  • Frame and base rails made from heavy gauge galvanised steel
  • Glide and track door
  • Minimal maintenance required
  • Limited Manufacturer's 15 Year Warranty

Full Details

The Globel 6x4ft Low Pent Metal Garden Shed is crafted from durable, hot-dipped galvanised steel and boasts a traditional color, making it the perfect choice for anyone seeking a rust-free storage solution for at least 15 years. This high-quality shed, the result of extensive research and development, is stronger and more durable than ever before. Plus, with the help of a user-friendly instruction manual and an easy-to-follow assembly video, building your shed will be a breeze.

Trust us, the experts at Globel have thought of everything to make your experience as hassle-free as possible. And don't just take our word for it - this revolutionary shed is the top choice for many satisfied customers. Keep in mind that the measurements given for the models are based on the roof dimensions, so be sure to check the exact measurements for the precise building dimensions. Also, don't forget to follow our instructions for preparing a solid base for your new shed before it is delivered.

 

Base Requirements

All steel sheds must be anchored to a firm foundation to protect against wind damage.
We can supply a Timber base or a Foundation Kit, which you can purchase with your product.
Should I buy a timber base or a foundation kit for my metal shed? What’s the difference?
All shed bases should be constructed on level ground with a damp proof membrane.

The timber base allows you to construct a wooden floor (using the instructions provided), place it on your level ground over your damp-proof membrane and attach the shed to it. This is a quick, simple and cost-effective solution to a garden shed base.

A foundation kit forms a steel grid over your damp-proof membrane, allowing you either to fill it with concrete or cover it with marine ply to create an internal floor.

Both base options are ideal for steel buildings, however, if you have an existing concrete or slab base with a damp-proof membrane, you will not require either option

It is ideal for caravan parks where non-combustible storage is required, providing a rust-free, long-lasting solution with a minimum warranty of 15 years.

title: Globel Pent Metal Garden Shed - Choose Size
body_html:
The Globel Pent Metal Shed is a premium pent roof shed manufactured from high-tensile, hot-dipped galvanised steel. This fantastic metal shed is rust-resistant, robust, durable, and easy to build! Plus, it comes in a timeless anthracite grey or heritage green finish, making the Globel Pent as stylish as it is sturdy.

Design insights

  • Lightweight metal garden shed
  • High grade 0.3mm steel and paint finish
  • Ventilated gables
  • Heavy-gauge galvanised steel
  • Glide & track door
  • Limited Manufacturer's 15 Year Warranty

Full Details

Globel Pent Metal Shed

The Globel Pent fronted premium garden shed is a pent roof shed manufactured from high tensile, hot-dipped galvanised steel throughout. This product is the final result of two years of research and development by those who have been involved with light-clad metal sheds for many years.

A combined effort between a factory with brand new steel roll forming equipment and a research team has now produced a shed which is stronger, more durable and easier to build but remains in a traditional colour combination. This is development in light-clad metal sheds at the best value price.

Globel sheds are perfect for caravan parks where non-combustible storage sheds are compulsory and will provide a rust-free, practical storage solution for a minimum warranty period of 15 years. These products are the highest specification lightweight metal garden sheds on the market.

Apart from the high grade of 0.3mm steel and paint finish, they have ventilated gables and all standard buildings have the tallest wall height available. The frame and base rails are made from solid heavy gauge galvanised steel, the parts and their fixings are simple and straightforward to assemble.

Each door, the door glide & track layout have been designed with strength and simplicity in mind. The door glide itself has been completely redesigned to provide a more stable and well-balanced door opening, providing you with a high-quality range of metal sheds.

This Globel Pent metal shed is a secure metal storage shed, perfect for keeping your garden tools inside. The galvanised steel ensures the shed is weather resistant, meaning this metal building is extra strong. Since this she is available in a range of sizes too, you're bound to find a shed that fits your needs.

A huge effort has gone into the preparation of the instruction manual to ensure that it is as ‘user friendly’ and as informative as possible. Our suppliers have sought input and advice from many trusted sources, enabling them to compile a manual which helps to ensure the assembly is more of a pleasure than a chore!!

Nominal model sizes are based on the roof dimensions.
Please refer to the exact measurements for the precise building dimensions.
Full details on preparing a base for all buildings will be sent before the unit is delivered.

Base Requirements

All steel sheds must be anchored to a firm foundation to protect against wind damage.
We can supply a Timber base or a Foundation Kit, which you can purchase with your product.

Should I buy a timber base or a foundation kit for my metal shed? What’s the difference?

All shed bases should be constructed on level ground with a damp-proof membrane.
The timber base allows you to construct a wooden floor (using the instructions provided), place it on your level ground over your damp-proof membrane and attach the shed to it. This is a quick, simple and cost-effective solution to a garden shed base.
A foundation kit forms a steel grid over your damp-proof membrane, allowing you either to fill it with concrete or cover it with marine ply to create an internal floor.
Both base options are ideal for steel buildings, however, if you have an existing concrete or slab base with a damp-proof membrane, you will not require either option.

title: Falcon 500L Heavy Duty Garden Storage Box
body_html:
The Falcon Heavy Duty Storage Box is ideal for durable outdoor storage. Constructed from 0.6mm thick galvanised steel panels, it boasts both a heavy-duty metal floor and stainless-steel fixings which ensure it will remain rust-free and provide long-term premium protection. What’s more, this outdoor storage box is fire-proof and completely maintenance-free, saving you both time and money!

Design insights

  • 0.6mm galvanised steel panels
  • Gas assisted spring damper for easy lid opening
  • Heavy-Duty metal floor
  • Heavy duty galvanised steel panels
  • Heavy duty galvanised steel floor and lid
  • Double-bolted key-operated lock
  • Superior stainless-steel fixings and contemporary anthracite finish

Full Details

Constructed from 0.6mm thick galvanised steel panels, the Falcon Heavy Duty Storage Box features a heavy-duty metal floor and stainless-steel fixings for rust-free, long-lasting premium protection. In addition, it is fire-proof and requires no maintenance, saving both time and money.

With a top-opening gas-strut-assisted lid and double-bolted key lock, owners can easily access their belongings while enjoying added security and peace of mind. Designed to be bolted onto a hard base, this metal storage box is secure and reliable. Choose from a variety of sizes and take advantage of the 10-year non-perforation warranty offered by the manufacturer.

This popular metal box is perfect for storing garden tools, equipment, kids' toys, and other must-haves. It also functions as a comfortable seating space. Assembly is simple and instructions are included for your convenience.

title: Polycarbonate Lean-To Greenhouse - Choose Size
body_html:
This Polycarbonate Lean-To Greenhouse is expertly designed to withstand even the most extreme weather conditions, providing a long-lasting and secure environment for your plants. The durable aluminium frame and rust-proof base ensure exceptional strength and stability. A unique feature of the greenhouse is the opening roof vent, which allows for optimal airflow, while the water gutter system effectively manages drainage. The twin-wall polycarbonate glazing diffuses sunlight, protecting your plants from excessive heat and ensuring proper light exposure. Additionally, the shatterproof polycarbonate glazing enhances the structural durability and safety of the greenhouse, reducing the risk of panel damage. The convenient sliding door prevents slamming in strong winds, preserving the integrity of the greenhouse and minimizing potential damage.

With low-maintenance, UV-protected materials, this Polycarbonate Lean-To greenhouse offers hassle-free gardening solutions that require minimal upkeep. Its sleek and compact design makes it perfect for year-round use.

Design insights

  • Space saving lean to design
  • Low maintenance, rust free aluminium framing
  • 44mm hollow twin polycarbonate panels are virtually unbreakable
  • Sliding single door
  • Water gutters for drainage
  • Roof vent for air circulation and good ventilation
  • Galvanised steel base
  • Finished in green to blend nicely into your garden

Why Buy a Lean-To Greenhouse?

Why buy the Lean-To Greenhouse?

Base

Key Features

Tough, Rust-Proof Aluminium Frame

Our Polycarbonate Lean-To Greenhouse takes pride in being an extremely weatherproof design, made with aluminium frames and brackets with a galvanised steel base. It is sure to last for years, keeping your plants healthy and well-protected for a long period of time.

Opening Roof Vent

The opening roof vent allows your plants to receive the optimum amount of airflow. Similarly, the design includes a water gutter that ensures an efficient drainage system inside your greenhouse.

Twin-wall Polycarbonate

The glazing diffuses sunlight and spreads it around the interior, protecting your plants from excessive heat.

Shatterproof Glazing

As the greenhouse is made from polycarbonate materials, you can be sure that its panels are unlikely to break too.

Convenient Slide Door

Its sliding door prevents it from slamming closed amid strong winds as well, limiting potential damage to both the greenhouse, and its important features.

Low Maintenance

Our Polycarbonate Lean-To greenhouse requires very little maintenance, thanks to its hard-wearing materials that are UV-protected.
